Are you a real American football fan? Are you stuck behind a desk and longing for some football time? Whether American football or rugby game is the thing that you are after, then your search mission ends here. Liberate the gaming spirit in you and invest some leisure time with these games. Get ready and let the American football championship a chance to start!
At americanfootballgames.net you can find and play the latest rugby and American football games. Discover the football games which are mostly played by the other people. Find numerous sorts of free American football games, such as – rugby football games, NFL games, rugby kicking games and many other fantastic games related to this beautiful sport. While you will play the games, you will feel like you are indeed involved in a real match and you will need to choose the strategies which you will use to bring victory for your team.
Are you ready to enter the rugby hall of glory? Get the ball and begin running, handling, kicking and tossing more than ever before! Score the winning touchdown and become a popular American football player star!

It’s another season in the Axis Football League, and you have the control in your hand of your most favorite team. So, just call the plays and fix up your own formations to use the best of your team while taking advantage of the limitation of the other teams.
You can easily control your players with the arrow keys and use the mouse to lead your team to the victory. Can you be the best among all competitor players and take part in the hall of fame?

It’s a quite amazing American Football flash game. All you need to accomplish in the game is to- make your way through the field into the final zone before anyone can tackle you. You will receive an extra life each time you will score three touchdowns.

Get ready for the Super Bowl in this football game, which is also known as the 4th and Goal! It’s undoubtedly a magnificent game for the fans of football. You have to avoid, bash and dash past the rival as you rushed to the end zone to score a touchdown for your group! Yet, you need to remember all the different power ups to use those to score touchdowns.
Call the plays, manage your players, and smash your rivals. This 2016 adaptation of the Fourth and Goal, which permits players to choose their own particular team colors. You can also choose the colors of your opponent teams.

Check out the latest added features, such as new weather, extra fields or a whole new play!

This is a new way to play American football. It is a unique combination of American football, darts, and bot fights. Botball may look hard at first, but it is fun and an addicting game as you get hang of it.

In this game, you control a player with your arrow keys. Navigate him through angry zombies and make that award-winning touchdown! There are some power-ups to help you along the way.
Zombie American football is a great flash game, produced by ESPN.

Throw the football at the rival football players before they get too close and keep eliminating them one by one.

Quarterback Challenge 2 offers a three-dimensional viewpoint and advanced leveling. In each level, you will have 5 throws at your hands. Try hitting interactive targets to score points. Balloons and coins may give you an extra round.
The levels are designed to act as mini puzzles – your mission is to hit all the targets.

But, unfortunately, it’s not as simple as it seems. You have to face the defenders as they will be trying to block by jumping in front of you. Therefore, you have to try to kick at the time when the defender crouches down.

Game of 3 Halves is a pretty exciting and challenging running rugby game. You will not face many obstacles to earn a score in this game. Check out the drop-down menu to pick your perfect team and also the rival team to start the race against time to score enough to win the trophy. Use your mouse to direct the ball carrier to make quick passes utilizing the space bar to avoid the tacklers. This game just exceeds the expectation of anyone due to being an incredibly addictive and fun game for people of all ages.

One of the best tackles football games. It’s all about tackling within time. The beginning levels are pretty simple, just press the spacebar at the time you cross over the middle of a target, and later on, let it go at the moment your angle is completely right. As the levels increases, the game gets complicated with more and more tricks and techniques. So, make sure that you have read up all the rules of the games before proceeding to the next level!

All you need to do is – scrambling blitz bots to a great extent at the time you rush towards the end-zone in the sequel to Scrambled Legs. Play this fantastic American football game for free.

This game is quite complicated, as here, it’s almost required to have some extraordinary skills to obtain the winning score. You have to play seriously to make your way to the end zone, as the opponent will play hard to take you down before you reach to the end-zone.

In this online game, you will play the solid American football. Your aim will be reaching to the end zone as fast as possible. Your other team-mates will try harder to exclude the rivals consistently. If they can exclude the others, definitely it will easier for you to reach to the end zone faster. When you are rushing to the end of the field, remember to collect the gold coins. Then you will need to send your score to the game server to make the base of comparison with other players.

Your task will be leading your team from the twenty-yard line and be driving down to the pitch to obtain maximum scores to claim the victory.
The general rules of football are applied here, and if you lose in four matches, the game will be over. You have to make it through the land where mines are hidden to add an extra challenge for you. So, you have to put your step much more carefully to avoid the mines and have to score the max to take Daffy into the record books in this very exciting and fast game. It is great American football game online for kids.

This is a kind of exciting game where you have to help Kenny as he is quite late for the game. Assist him to have the last touchdown by evading objects and beating down all the bullies that deter him from his goal.

In this Tasmanian American Football game, you have to score a touchdown before anyone can stop you on your way. Sometimes, you may have to neutralize them by jumping on their heads or whirling after eating the hot-dog and getting powered-up. It’s a complete fun game with Taz playing.

It’s quite simple, yet exciting game where you need to kick a goal to proceed to the next position around the field. But, once you miss a goal, you will get a strike. Once you get three strikes, the game will come to an end. So, best of luck.

Another enjoyable football game to play online. In this game, you need to use the mouse to direct your player. Press Z for sliding, X for jumping and running as fast as you can.

It is considered as the gridiron game that all players can enjoy. In this free online football game, it’s possible to dodge an entire defense to reach to the end-zone. So, it’s easy for you to score the touchdown.

Before playing this game, make sure that you clearly understand all the rules of this game. It may seem easy in the earlier levels, but truly it’s not as simple as you think. Firstly, you have to choose your players, and afterward, you have to check on which side you are going to play – the offensive or the defensive. When the game starts, you have to rock on. Depending on your direction your players will move and sometimes, you may feel that everything is just going wrong. You have to practice a lot to keep the track record of the champion at all times.

It’s an extreme challenging yet most entertaining football game where you are going fight completely alone against an entire team of opponents. What do you think? Can you manage to win this game? At the start of the game, you will need to press the SPACE bar very fast to launch yourself from a larger distance. And this will aid you to proceed further levels. So, play this new game and earn enough points to gain the victory.

The only one goal you will have in this game is to – deliver incredibly sharp big-hitting tackles to the rivals to position your team to the top of the leaderboard. Play this free football game online right away!

There is a subtle difference between American Football and this Two-A-Days game. You have to play the game in a fiendish obstacle course. Therefore, you will need to have complete skills and knowledge about football games. You need to be a master in jumping, dodging and running through the way. You will have to collect the life in order to keep up your energy as well.
It’s sure that when you reach the advanced level, you will be addicted to it, and it will keep you busy for a significant number of days.

Ish Sub also a bit different from a real football game. You have to make use of the arrow keys to gather the icons on the pitch and to dodge the bots that will try to hunt you down. "
Sophia Hathaway, Sophomore, South Pasadena
Just a sophomore, she proved her worth for the Tigers and earned first-team accolades in the Rio Hondo League. She was a rebounding machine, averaging 11.9 a contest. In addition, the sophomore averaged 10.2 points and two blocks a contest.
Kayla Pounds, Senior, Blair
The All-Area Player of the Year candidate did some of her best work in the Rio Hondo League and was rewarded as the league’s player of the year. Along with averaging 24.2 points and 12.3 rebounds a game, she also scored 40 or more points in three contests.
Aysia Shellmire, Senior, Burroughs
Was a force in the middle for the Indians, helping them to a share of the Pacific League championship and earning co-Pacific League Player of the Year honors. Along with averaging 19.9 points a game, she also averaged eight rebounds and two steals.
Kandyce Smith, Junior, La Salle
Stepped up and led the way for the Lancers, who advanced to the second round of the CIF Southern Section playoffs. The junior earned All-Del Rey League first-team honors, as she averaged 17 points, 5.4 rebounds, 2.6 assists and 1.9 steals.
Kiki Yang, Sophomore, Pasadena Poly
The sophomore showed her skills by excelling in the Prep League and earning player of the year honors while guiding the Tigers to a fifth straight title. Her 18.4 points, 6.1 steals, 4.1 assists and 3.5 rebounds filled up the stat line every game.
CO-COACHES OF THE YEAR
Kevin Kiyomura and Jamye Kiyomura Chan, Flintridge Prep
The two helped guide the Rebels to a wildly successful season and an impressive run to the CIF Southern Section Division V-AA semifinals, where they lost to powerhouse Sierra Canyon. In addition, Flintridge Prep placed second in the Prep League and made an appearance in the state tournament, all in the first year under the helm of the new coaches, who took over a program that had just seven wins the season prior and finished 19-10."

Narty i akcesoria, deski snowboardowe, buty narckarskie i kaski oraz zestawy na każde warunki dla narciarzy i snowboardzistów.
Jesteśmy najstarszym sklepem narciarskim online w kraju!
Tylko u nas profesjonalna pomoc w doborze sprzętu dla Ciebie i Twoich dzieci.
Liczne konkursy z nagrodami od naszych największych partnerów jak marki K2 Ski, K2 Snowboarding, Head, Salomon, Atomic, Fischer czy Volkl lub Burton oraz Dakine.
przejdź do sklepu
Wiązania snowboardowe produkowane przez firmę SP już dawno zyskały miano trwałych i niezawodnych konstrukcji. Jednakże austriacki producent nie przestaje ulepszać swoich produktów, czego dowodem było powstanie rewolucyjnych zapinania Fastec. Wiązania SP Fastec zostały stworzone na podstawie zupełnie nowego projektu, który szybko okazał się prawdziwym przełomem. Jakie właściwości mają te wiązania i dlaczego są one uznawane za tak wyjątkowe?
Oczywiście wysoka jakość wykonania jest wręcz standardem w przypadku produktów sygnowanych marką SP. Dlatego to nie ona zadecydowała o tym, że nowy typ wiązań zdobył tak dużą popularność. Sekretem zapięć Fastec okazały się bowiem zastosowane zmiany konstrukcyjne. Ich podstawą został nowy system
Auto RS,
który automatycznie unosi strap wiązania po odchyleniu łyżki.
Największą zaletą takiego rozwiązania jest
łatwiejsze wpinanie i wypinanie buta
. Snowboardzista musi jedynie odbezpieczyć i odchylić łyżkę, a następnie umieścić buta w wiązaniu. Później wystarczy tylko podnieść łyżkę, założyć mechanizm zabezpieczający oraz naciągnąć strapa przy użyciu dźwigni Auto RS. Cały proces jest więc naprawdę prosty, dzięki czemu każdy snowboardzista szybko zrozumie sposób działania mechanizmu. Co więcej, założenie wiązania SP Fastec trwa dosłownie kilkanaście sekund. Podsumowując,
duża użyteczność
i
wygoda użytkowania
są bardzo istotnymi cechami w przypadku sprzętu snowboardowego. Nic więc dziwnego, że wiązania Fastec zostały uznane za najlepiej dopasowaną serię pod względem szybkiego wpinania. W związku z tym można polecić je wszystkim snowboardzistom, którzy stawiają na sprzęt najwyższej klasy.
Wprowadzenie nowego systemu zapinania okazało się ogromnym sukcesem. Z tego względu firma SP postanowiła rozwijać swoją technologię i co ważniejsze – uwzględnić ją w przyszłych projektach. Efektem tej decyzji okazało się powstanie wielu nowych modeli wiązań, które zawierają system Fastec.
Wiązania SP Fastec sLAB Moutain
to idealna propozycja dla najbardziej wymagających snowboardzistów. Poza zapięciami Fastec warto tutaj wyróżnić specjalną
płytę sLAB
. Została ona zaprojektowana przy użyciu wyjątkowej odmiany aluminium, dzięki czemu wiązanie stało się dużo lżejsze, ale zachowało swoje właściwości. Trzeba również wspomnieć o ulepszonej płycie amortyzującej, która zapewnia wysoką
ochronę stóp i kostek
podczas dynamicznej jazdy. Jedynym problemem dla niektórych snowboardzistów może okazać się wysoka cena tych wiązań. Niemniej w tym przypadku należy stwierdzić, że cena idzie w parze z jakością.

Tańszą alternatywą dla opisanych wiązań sLAB Mountain mogą stać się
wiązania SP Fastec Private
. Co prawda, ten model nie zawiera tak licznych udogodnień, jednakże wciąż jest to solidny i godny uwagi produkt. Niepodważalnymi atutami wiązań Private są:
wysoka trwałość
,
szeroki zakres regulacji
oraz oczywiście sam system Fastec.

Oczywiście każdy snowboardzista powinien pamiętać o tym, że przed rozpoczęciem jazdy należy odpowiednio ustawić wiązania. Poradnik dotyczący tego zagadnienia został niedawno opublikowany na naszym blogu –
ZOBACZ!

Powiadom mnie o nowych wpisach przez email.

Bądź na bieżąco i zapisz się do naszego newslettera już dziś!

The College’s picturesque nine hole course was opened in 1998 by former Ryder Cup Captain Bernard Gallacher & designed by renowned architect Donald Steel (
www.donaldsteel.com)
whose list of major championship courses including many Open venues.
In the short history of Bradfield Golf, the course has seen many a European tour winner grace these pleasant pastures from Sam Torrance, Ronan Rafferty, Barry Lane & most recently Paul McGinley.
The generosity of multiple “Old Boys of the College” helped make this vision happen with a major contribution coming from Mr Chris Hacking.
The club ethos was laid down under the premise of equality for all. Respecting the game and its associated dress code of smart, casual attire with the exceptions of denim and T-shirts.
Popular at Bradfield is the luxury of no tee times, making the experience for beginners new to the sport less intimidating.
As the modern world only increases in demands for time, this new club initiative gives the most time-starved player a solution.
In less than 90mins, a member can receive professional coaching in the Performance Studio (Trackman), giving the member a fast feel of real, then choose from the 25+ Virtual courses & play 18 holes.
All of this in a fraction of the time, measured & documented for future reference.
We have created “one of a kind” Indoor Performance Studio in Berkshire with over 2,000sq feet of space in which to hone your game. The outdoor facilities comprise of a full size USGA putting/chipping green with (Tyrell’s) green side bunker, a pitching range for 30-100yds shots and a Huxley 4 bay practice net.
Opened in November 2017 the new addition of an extended clubhouse.
We have various levels for families, adults & juniors from as little as £165 per year for Juniors.
The membership year runs from 1st April to 31st March. Memberships are sold on a pro-rata basis throughout the year.
For more information and to fill in an application form

Set of American Football Number Stencils comprising of single numbers which can be placed together to create the desired number.
All are made from smooth lay flat banner material and are outline cut for simple and easy spot marking.
The set consists of the following:
1 x Number 0 (1.4m tall)
1 x Number 1 (1.4m tall)
1 x Number 2 (1.4m tall)
1 x Number 3 (1.4m tall)
1 x Number 4 (1.4m tall)
1 x Number 5 (1.4m tall)
1 x Arrow

Sunny skies. Gusty winds during the morning. High 64F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph. Higher wind gusts possible..
Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.
Updated: April 20, 2019 @ 9:20 am
Herald & Review/Jim Bowling Thomas Jefferson Middle School dodge ball match rewards with professional football player Brit Miller at the school Monday February 25, 2013
Herald & Review/Jim Bowling Thomas Jefferson Middle School dodge ball match rewards with professional football player Brit Miller at the school Monday February 25, 2013
DECATUR — As marriages made in heaven go, it’s hard to imagine a better one than Duck Dynasty and Brit Miller.
No, they haven’t been to the altar yet, not the A&E Network reality show that centers on the wholesome but eccentric Robertson family and their Duck Commander empire, nor the free agent NFL fullback from Decatur who some would say was born for reality TV.
But they’re distant kissing cousins, their acquaintances made when Korie Robertson — wife of Duck Commander CEO Willie Robertson — got a glimpse of Miller’s DPCTED Apparel line of T-shirts, several of which reference beards.
If you’re one of the record 9.6 million viewers who recently tuned into the Season 3 finale, you know that the Robertson men pride themselves on their redneck ways and long flowing beards.
So Miller’s T-shirts from his “Chubby Domination” line hit the bullesye when Korie Robertson noticed versions that said, “BEARDED GUYS CUDDLE BETTER,” and “MY BEARD JUST STARTED GROWING A BEARD,” and “BEARDED FOR YOUR PLEASURE.”
Contacts were made, information was exchanged and before long shirts were sent to all the Duck Dynasty guys in time for Christmas.
“And that’s kind of the deal that started it all,” Miller recalled this week as he completed his relocation from St. Louis back to Decatur.
Originally, Miller hoped he might find his way onto an episode of Duck Dynasty. A natural tie was football, since Duck Commander founder Phil Robertson — the patriarch of the family and the creator of the duck call that led to a multi-million dollar empire — was once a quarterback at Louisiana Tech, starting ahead of eventual four-time Super Bowl winner Terry Bradshaw.
But they were wrapping up filming for the season and that didn’t work out.
However, in the overlap that happens when worlds collide, a Duck Dynasty producer knew of another venture that was looking for a professional athlete to use on an outdoors show starring former NBA center Brad Miller.
Stars aligned and a week ago Brit Miller and his brother-in-law, Nate Chandler, found themselves at Brad Miller’s private hunting lodge in northeast Indiana, there to stalk wild turkey with a shotgun.
“It ended up being one of the most fun weeks I’ve had,” Brit Miller said. “It was totally different.”
Miller said the show is tentatively targeted for early July on an endeavor called, “Country Boys Outdoors.”
Brit Miller admitted he was somewhat out of his element, although he was no rookie to hunting.
“I used to hunt with my grandfather, but all we did was deer hunt and that was in the fall and I was usually busy with football,” he said. “I found out the last time I had a hunting license was in 1999.”
Despite that, Miller stepped up and delivered.
Please call 800-453-2472 to upgrade your subscription.
“I was the first one to get a turkey,” he said. “But, of course, I told them I would be.”
Brit was surprised to find out that Brad Miller had built his lodge specifically to fit his 7-foot frame.
“Everything is made for what I would call a giant,” Brit said. “The island in the kitchen was made for a 7-footer. I went to lean on it and I could put my chin on it.
“I couldn’t even reach the towel rack. It was funny to experience that, but Brad was really cool. It took me back to my ‘Journey’ days at Illinois.”
Back when Brit Miller was a linebacker at the University of Illinois, he became a central figure in the Big Ten Networks’ own reality show, “The Journey,” which captured the Illini football team in behind-the-scenes looks.
That’s why more than one friend has told Brit he’s destined for a role in reality TV.
“The trouble with that is, I feel like everyone on reality TV is just waiting for some kind of downfall,” he said. “I don’t want to be that guy.”
What Miller does want is to extend his NFL career. He and his agent are optimistic.
“Now that the stuff with the draft and rookies is done, my agent thinks something positive will happen,” he said. “We’d rather be employed right now, but the trouble with the fullback position is that there’s only going to be one per team.
“Our feeling is that we’ll be picked up this summer when teams realize their guy isn’t going to be good enough. It just takes one phone call.”
So Miller keeps working out, waiting for that phone to ring.
It could be a very important call because he needs just one more NFL game to qualify for the league’s pension program. And since he’s getting married this summer, that would be a very big deal.
“I’d feel more secure for my family’s future,” he said. “It’s been a great run so far, but I don’t see it coming to an end just yet.”
Meanwhile, a call from the Robertson’s at Duck Dynasty would be nice, too. Miller senses there’s a connection.
Somehow, there’s a feeling Brit Miller and the show’s unpredictable Si Robertson are kindred souls.
mtupper@herald-review.com
|(217) 421-7983

BE600S

DETAILS
A lighter weight system that has more efficient flow and shows a noticeable improvement in throttle response whilst enhancing that sports car sound.
The system is designed to work with the engine, so at lower revs the sound remains relatively civilised and at higher revs it provides more presence and volume.

- Wonderful deep muscle rich sound.
- Active Valves
- Stainless Steel
.

- Improved throttle response.

Al Dall’Ara, la Juventus taglia il traguardo della qualificazione ai quarti di finale di Coppa Italia senza faticare e lasciando in panchina molti titolari. Vabtaggio iniziale su errore della difesa bolognese, di Bernardeschi, poi nella ripresa raddoppia Kean. Per Inzaghi una prova incolore, con Soriano e Sansone in campo dal 1′ minuto.

no-repeat;top:88px;right:40px}#sports_video_Vip .sports_video_content{color:#b6b6b6;width:320px;margin-left:50px;line-height:1.5;font-size:13px;top:48px;border-right:2px dashed #5d5d5d;position:relative}
撰稿/陈月泽
不久前刚刚落幕的中澳男篮对抗赛，残阵出战的中国男篮红队，最终取得了1胜2负的战绩。但主力中锋王哲林，给了所有人一种焕然一新的感觉。
在缺少周琦、邹雨宸等内线悍将的情况下，中国男篮红队的内线面临人手短缺的窘境，但王哲林在三场比赛中，将红队内线的重担都扛在了自己的肩上。首场比赛他出战24分钟，拿到18分，第二战状态更佳，砍下20分8个篮板。第三站王哲林继续着不错的状态，贡献14分和5个篮板。身材硬朗的澳洲内线面对这个身高达到2米13的大个子，着实感到有些头疼。
这是一个令人熟悉又陌生的王哲林，他的改变首先来自于自己的体重和身形。两个月左右的时间，他减去了30斤的体重，这其中需要付出怎样的努力和毅力，不言而喻。
比赛结束之后，王哲林也和相熟的记者聊起了自己成功减重的话题。“你信我，一定要戒掉甜食，戒掉碳酸饮料……”王哲林认真地说道。而当记者对王哲林说：“减重之后你的颜值更高了，球技也增长了，”王哲林的脸上，露出了一丝腼腆而内敛的笑容。
只有王哲林自己明白，这两个月的时间，自己究竟经历了怎样的考验。
很长一段时间以来，王哲林都是一个吨位不小的内线球员，体重的增长让他的对抗能力有了一定的增加，但也影响了他的爆发力和灵活性。更重要的是，体重大意味着脚踝、膝盖等部位也要承受更大的负荷，这无疑也会加剧他受伤的风险。因此在CBA联赛结束之后，王哲林也采纳了教练组的建议，开始努力减重。
减重是一项痛苦的过程，不仅需要持之以恒的训练，更重要的是在饮食上的自律和约束。尤其是晚餐，摄入食物的品种和数量，需要有严格的限制。王哲林也不少次感受过饿着肚子入睡的感觉。夜晚，正是人的意志力最薄弱的时候，不少忍住晚上强忍饥饿减肥的朋友们，都是最容易在夜晚点外卖“破戒”，但王哲林还是坚持了下来。


王哲林脚步更加灵活
体重变轻30斤，让王哲林在场上仿佛卸下了一个沉重的包袱。他的脚步移动更加迅速，他强起杀伤篮下的冲击力更强，他的禁区补防与协防也变得更加威力十足。面对对抗凶狠、身材壮硕的澳洲内线，王哲林一点都并不吃亏。他绷紧的胸膛和扎实的下盘，让他可以自信地与对方对抗，而灵活性增加之后，王哲林柔和的手感和灵动的脚步，也屡屡让对手尝到不小的苦头。
缺少了多名主力的红队最终只赢了一场球，但王哲林的出色状态，还是给了人们不小的惊喜。
不知道，看到王哲林现在的表现，多少人会想起六年前的波特兰。当时王哲林代表国际队参加耐克世界篮球峰会，这个刚刚年满18岁的少年，面对来自全美的一干青年才俊，全场砍下19分外加8个篮板，创造了中国球员参加该项赛事有史以来的最佳表现。
那个时候的王哲林，给人的印象深刻，甚至让不少来自美国NBA的球探都充满兴趣。他对抗扎实、下盘稳定，有力量、有技术、有投篮，打球不急不躁，判断冷静沉稳。那时候，周琦还没有进入很多球迷的视野，王哲林和李慕豪被视作中国男篮未来内线的希望。
或许我们现在会感叹，如果那一年的伦敦奥运会，邓华德能够带上王哲林；如果王哲林在那一年就参加NBA选秀，现在的他会不会走上一条全然不同的道路。残酷的竞技体育没有如果，生活和命运也没有如果。王哲林必须面对现实。


福建男篮核心
在进入CBA之后，王哲林很快成为福建队的核心，但赛季交出场均20+10的成绩单更是如同家常便饭。但是福建队始终孱弱的竞争力，让王哲林一直很难成为大多数人关注的焦点。而在国家队中，王哲林反复的状态，也让他一直难以拥有稳定的主力位置。2015年的亚锦赛上，年轻的中国男篮气贯长虹，重新杀回了亚洲巅峰。但王哲林起起伏伏的状态，让他成为了整届比赛中被外界质疑最多的球员。很多人并不知道，那个时候王哲林的腿部已经出现了比较严重的伤病，但大王并没有对外公开，他不想把这些当做借口。
“被人误解的心情肯定不好，但是没办法，就是受伤了，不过已经慢慢恢复了。这些时候（遭受质疑）做一些让自己开心的事情，尽量保持好心情。”谈到曾经位于质疑旋涡当中的压力，王哲林说道。
从当年国青男篮的核心，到日后被NBA灰熊队选中，王哲林虽然已经进入人们的视线多年，但他还是个大男孩，他也有情绪激动的时候。那是奥运会刚刚结束不久，王哲林在键盘侠们的攻击下终于有些忍无可忍，他在微博上写下一句话：“微博对你们来说，是宣泄自己情绪的地方吗？”随后又接连在评论区写道——“老喷子教教我怎么喷别人。”“这几天被一个奇葩的人气得不行，我也想发泄一下。”
这些年，王哲林打了不少世界大赛，他也渐渐经历着从男孩到男人的蜕变。他知道自己身上的责任和使命，也明白了行胜于言才是回应质疑的最佳方式。王哲林的娃娃脸上，依然时常挂着阳光般的笑容。他的目光，已经投向了明年的男篮世界杯，甚至更远的东京奥运会。
他减去了30斤的体重，他却因此更充满力量。

New Zealand
Test caps
One-Day International caps
Twenty20 International caps
New Zealand
Full name
Jeetan Shashi Patel
Born
May 7, 1980, Wellington
Current age
38 years 349 days
Major teams
New Zealand,
Warwickshire,
Wellington
Batting style
Right-hand bat
Bowling style
Right-arm offbreak
The son of Indian parents, but born and brought up in Wellington's eastern suburbs, offspinner Jeetan Patel was fast-tracked into the New Zealand side after John Bracewell, the national coach at the time, identified his promise.
That was no surprise: Patel had taken a five-wicket haul against Auckland on his first-class debut in early 2000 and played a role in Wellington winning the 2000-2001 Championship in the next season. They won again in 2003-04 and were runners up in 2001-02, 2002-03 and 2005-06.
While Patel probably never fulfilled his ability on the international stage, he developed into a highly effective bowling all-rounder at domestic level and has enjoyed a particularly successful spell as a long-term overseas player for Warwickshire, for whom he has produced much of his best cricket. At the end of the 2014 English domestic season - a season in which he had rejected an approach from New Zealand to resurrect his international career - he was named the Most Valuable Player in county cricket.
It was a return of 6 for 32 against Otago in the last State Championship match of 2004-05 that propelled him into international cricket. Bracewell took him to Zimbabwe for a one-day tournament in August 2005. He played nine ODIs during the season, but in eight was either the super-sub or the subbed-out player; his batting - at that stage - offered little. At home his 2 for 23 from ten overs throttled Sri Lanka at Wellington, and won him the man-of-the-match award, then three wickets at Christchurch helped subdue West Indies. All this put Patel in line for a first Test cap, which came against South Africa at Cape Town in April 2006.
He performed more than respectably - a five-wicket haul against West Indies at Napier in late 2008 was a highlight - but, with Daniel Vettori's presence limiting opportunities, Patel was generally reduced to the role of substitute or second spinner. He played only six home Tests - in each of them he was second spinner to Vettori - and when he finally had a chance to stake a claim as first choice, he struggled against India, Sri Lanka and South Africa. When New Zealand were thrashed by South Africa - they were bowled out for just 45 in Cape Town - with Patel bowled backing away, it seemed his time was up.
But whatever his struggles in international cricket, he proved an inspired choice as overseas player for Warwickshire. After scoring a maiden century on first-class debut for the club in 2009, he returned for every season afterwards except 2010, claiming 185 first-class wickets for the side up to the end of 2014 at an average of just 27.12 and contributing nearly 1,500 runs, too, at an average of nearly 29. He played a huge role in Warwickshire's Championship success of 2012, their T20 success of 2014 and took them within sight of a double of that season with an outstanding spell of bowling against Durham in the final of the Royal London One-Day Cup at Lord's. He finished with 107 wickets in all competitions that year and turned down a recall to the New Zealand squad for the Caribbean tour to ensure he maintained his excellent relationship with Warwickshire. They responded by extending his contract until the end of 2016.
Patel duly paid them back with 69 wickets to top the bowling charts for the season. He subsequently made a comeback to the national side when he was picked for the tour of India in September of that year and filled in for the injured Mark Craig for the second Test at Eden Gardens in his first appearance for his country in over three years.
In March the following year, Patel played his first Test at the Basin Reserve, his home ground, against South Africa. Two months later, he played his final match for New Zealand, an ODI against Bangladesh in Dublin. Though he made it to New Zealand's squad for the Champions Trophy, he did not play a game. Shortly after the tournament ended, Patel called time on his international career, making his announcement shortly after Luke Ronchi, his team-mate at the state and national levels, did.
George Dobell
Apr 12, 2019

Select Profcare 6650 albuestøtte med pute
Laget av 82% polyamid og 18% spandex. 3-punkts støtabsorberende EVA-pute med Armortec-yttermateriale sikrer optimal beskyttelse og bevegelsesfrihet. Et ”grippy”silikonønster på innsiden av ermet gir en kinesiologisk effekt og øker blodgjennomstrømmingen noe som resulterer i mer energi i armen og lettere restitusjon under og etter trening og kamp. Praktisk å spille med i varme haller, ettersom svetten ikke renner ned i hånden og gir dårligere grep om ballen i håndballspill.

Select Profcare sportsbind dekker de aller fleste idrettsutøveres behov både på elite- og mosjonsnivå.
En innovativ serie av støttebind og klær med kinesiologisk effekt og kompresjon er også utviklet og lagt i denne kategorien. Mange spillere i håndballverden bruker allerede profcare kompresjonsbind, og en rekke andre profesjonelle idrettsutøvere innen badminton, basketball og golf ser også fordelene ved denne innovasjonen.
Utøverens kropp krever pleie og oppmerksomhet. Her kommer vår lange liste over forskjellige sportspleieprodukter i spill. Med kjøleprodukter, kremer og en rekke tape typer tilbyr vi alle slags restitusjon etter trening og forberedelse til neste kamp.
www.select-sport.com

Воздухоопорное сооружение ООО «ФУТБОЛ-СЕРВИС»
31.01.2019
Производственным холдингом ""VECTOR-M"" AG завершен монтаж пневмокаркасного сооружения для АО ""НПП «Исток» им. Шокина"" (г. Фрязино). Площадь покрытия ПКС: 1296 кв.м. Целевое назначение: склад для хранения.

25.01.2019
Производственным холдингом ""VECTOR-M"" AG завершен шеф-монтаж пневмокаркасного сооружения для ООО ""Вельталь-авиа"" (г. Омск). Площадь покрытия ПКС: 843 кв.м. Целевое назначение: ангар для авиатехники.

2017 CLASS 7A STATE TOURNAMENT
Boys soccer
At Fort Smith Northside and Fort Smith Southside
Thursday, May 11
Game 2 — Rogers Heritage (West 4) vs. FS Southside or LR Central (Central 5)*, 10 a.m.
Game 4 — Bryant (Central 3) vs. Fayetteville, Van Buren or Bentonville West (West 6)*, 12 p.m.
Game 6 — Conway (Central 4) vs. Bentonville (West 5), 2 p.m.
Game 8 — Springdale or Rogers (West 3) vs. FS Southside or LR Central (Central 6)*, 4 p.m.
Friday, May 12
Game 9 — FS Northside (Central 1) vs. game 2 winner, 10 a.m.
Game 10 — Springdale or Rogers (West 2) vs. game 4 winner, 12 p.m.
Game 11 — Springdale Har-Ber (West 1) vs. game 6 winner, 2 p.m.
Game 12 — LR Catholic (Central 2) vs. game 8 winner, 4 p.m.
Saturday, May 13
Game 13 — Game 9 winner vs. game 10 winner, 10 a.m.
Game 14 — Game 11 winner vs. game 12 winner, 12 p.m.
Championship game
TBA
Game 15 — Game 13 winner vs. game 14 winner, TBA
*to be determined by matches on Monday, May 8

MICHAEL SUDHALTER
Caption
Close
Technically, Cy Woods High senior standout Jared Lakind is a three-year letterman for the Wildcats’ baseball program.

But Cy Woods coach Thomas Loria considers the versatile pitcher/first baseman the program’s first four-year letterman; Cy Woods, which opened in the fall of 2006, did not field a varsity team in the spring of 2007 - Lakind’s freshman year.

“He would have played varsity if we had a team,” Loria said. “He’s one of the best players I’ve coached or coached against (in nearly 25 years of coaching).”

Lakind, 18, has provided consistency for a Wildcats program that’s on the rise; Cy Woods entered the week with an 11-5-1 record, including 2-1 in Class 5A-District 15.

It’s a long season with 17 district games remaining, but Lakind led the Wildcats to a marquee victory last Wednesday.

He tossed the first no-hitter in Cy Woods history and struck out 10 in a 4-0 victory over a Cy Falls team that entered the game with just one loss.

“It was pretty cool,” Lakind said. “I didn’t really know I was throwing (a no-hitter) until after the game when they announced it.”

Lakind is 3-0 on the mound. He’s the ace on one of the district’s top pitching staffs, which includes senior Matthew Sims, who struck out 13 in a 3-1 win last Thursday over Langham Creek.

Entering the 2010 season, Lakind already had some impressive credentials.

He’s one of two returning starters, along with catcher Daniel Smith, that played on last spring’s team that finished second in the district and swept Leander, 2-0, in a best-of-three series for the program’s first postseason victories; they lost to College Park in the second round.

Three months later, Lakind pitched in the Aflac All-American High School Baseball Classic at Petco Park - home of the San Diego Padres.

“It was an honor to be playing (in that game) - it took a lot of hard work to get there,” Lakind said.

Last fall, Lakind signed with the University of Arkansas, and he’ll be teammates with longtime friend Jake Wise, a Cy Falls High senior, and fellow left-hander Eric Fisher, a senior on the Klein High team.

The Razorbacks recruited Lakind as a pitcher, first baseman and outfielder - and he enjoys playing in all three positions.

“The baseball program is top-notch, and the conference they play in (SEC) is probably the best in the nation,” Lakind said. “The facilities are second to none, and the coaches treat you like family. And everyone knows you.”

Lakind said he’s always enjoyed building things and plans on majoring in Architecture at Arkansas.

Lakind said that signing with the Razorbacks has taken some pressure off him during his senior season; he’s likely to become Cy Woods’ first MLB Draftee in June, but that’s not on his mind now.

“I don’t really worry about it,” he said.

Lakind’s hoping to lead his team to its first-ever district championship. In order to accomplish that feat, they’ll have to unseat three-time defending district champion and archrival , Cy-Fair.

That’s the school that Lakind would have attended if Cy Woods hadn’t been built; his older sister, Harriet, played on Cy-Fair’s 2008 Class 5A State Champion Girls Basketball Team and just finished her first year playing basketball at the US Air Force Academy Preparatory School in Colorado.

Cy-Fair edged Cy Woods, 8-7, in both teams’ district opener on March 10 at Cy-Fair field and again, 11-8, three days later in a non-district game at the Brenham Tournament.

They’ll meet again on April 6 at Cy Woods field.

“We know we can hang with them and beat them,” Lakind said. “Every time we play, it’s a good game. (I’ve learned from Coach Loria that) hard work and dedication will pay off. If it doesn’t pay off now, it will down the road. Good things will happen if you never give up.”

Today in the newspaper
Versión en castellano
0
Send this news item by email to:
Send to multiple recipients separating emails with a comma
Real Madrid are close to closing their most lucrative deal ever. The figures are jaw-dropping: the club is to rake in between €450 and 500 million over 20 years. In return, the sponsor would have the right to include its name in the stadium's.
In short, the Santiago Bernabéu would be re-baptised in exchange for an astronomical sum of money. Real Madrid have been working on a deal that would include a name-change for their stadium for some time now, and it seems that a deal is close to being signed. The club has an agreement with IPIC (International Petroleum Investment Company), 100% owned by the royal family of Abu Dhabi.
Consultation
The deal would give Real the money they need for the remodelling of the stadium, a project that has been planned extensively and is ready to be executed. The only thing standing in the club's way is the Plataforma Civica de Vecinos del Bernabéu (Neighbours of the Bernabéu Civil Platform), which has protested against the proposed works being carried out.
The sponsorship/name-changing deal may very well be the blockbuster news announced during the club's General Assembly.
The agreement is as spectacular as it is delicate. Florentino Pérez has always been concerned of the fans' reaction to the re-naming of the stadium. However, the money involved makes it an offer difficult to refuse.
0

Ab 9:30 Uhr im Herzen von Abtsgmünd, auf der Hauptstr. vor dem Rathaus.

Der Verlauf wird entlang der Hauptstraße und Bachgasse, unmittelbarer vor dem Rathausplatz sein. Eine tolle Kulisse ist unseren jüngsten Sportaner damit garantiert.
Eine komplette Schleife ist ca. 500 Meter lang und wird je nach Altersklasse 1 bis 3 mal gelaufen.

Höhepunkt ist wieder die Siegerehrung auf dem Rathausplatz.

Wir freuen uns auf dich
Auf bald in Abtsgmünd
Euer Team Sportacus


Der AOK-Mini-Sportacus 2015 wird präsentiert von:


"
""
"
LAKEWOOD, N.J. - Since Cole Hamels - the last of the four aces - departed at the trade deadline in 2015, the Phillies have used 17 pitchers to start a game. Some of them you wanted to erase from memory as soon as possible. Others you knew were nothing but veteran placeholders. A few have provided hope for the future.
None of them has done anything to deserve a nickname like Thor or the Dark Knight, the godly and superhero monikers attached to the New York Mets' duo of Noah Syndergaard and Matt Harvey. Those kinds of designations are reserved for guys who can consistently throw in the mid to high 90s and break off secondary pitches that buckle knees.
You don't have to be a baseball scout to know when you've seen one of those guys. It's as obvious as the helpless expressions on the face of the hitters stepping in against them. You want to rebuild a franchise, insert a young, powerful ace into the mix and watch a ball club light up.
The Phillies might just have their superman and his real name is so good that he does not need a nickname.
Sixto Sanchez was a 74-mile drive away from Citizens Bank Park on Thursday night when he started the home opener for the Phillies' low-A Lakewood BlueClaws. Only 18 years old and with just three years of experience as a pitcher, the Dominican is likely to remain in that shore area community at least through June, if not the entire season.
Go see him if you get a chance. He's fun to watch and not just because the radar gun reveals that his fastball sits between 95 and 98 miles per hour. He's also one of the fastest workers you will ever see.
""I like to work fast so the hitters don't have a chance to think too much,"" Sanchez said through the interpretation of Nelson Prada, the hitting coach at Lakewood. ""I catch the ball and I'm ready for the next pitch. I know what I want to do and sometimes it's tough for the hitters when you're ready to go.""
Mickey Moniak, the first overall pick in last June's draft, has one of the best spots in the ballpark to watch Sanchez. The centerfielder watched Sanchez post a 5-0 record and a 0.50 ERA in 11 starts in the Gulf Coast League last season and has also watched him pitch twice this year.
""Ever since the GCL last year, when he really came out of nowhere, whenever he pitched we knew we were going to win,"" Moniak said. ""We knew we were going to get five scoreless innings. He's just that good. Watching him from center field is a great view. It's just effortless. The ball seems to move a little bit both ways, but he knows exactly where it's going.""
Sanchez, a 6-foot, 185-pound righthander, is 0-1 with a 4.66 ERA in his two starts this season, but do not be fooled by those numbers. In his season debut at Kannapolis, he struck out eight in 42/3 innings and was charged with four runs in the fifth even though two of them scored after he departed.
He was dominating in Lakewood's home opener Thursday - a 2-0 loss to Greensboro - allowing a single run on five hits in five innings while also striking out five without a walk. He threw first-pitch strikes to 14 of the 18 batters he faced and 50 of his 68 pitches were strikes.
""He just needs the experience of a full season,"" Lakewood pitching coach Brian Sweeney said. ""This is a league that exposes you to a lot of different things: bus rides, cold weather, small ballparks, good hitters. He needs to be exposed to that and that is going to help his development.""
Sanchez knows he has things to work on. He said refining his secondary pitches - a change-up and slider - top the list of his goals for this season. The only run he allowed against Greensboro came on a couple of fifth-inning singles when he left two sliders up in the zone.
""The first hit was an 0-2 pitch that he left up and that guy eventually scored,"" Sweeney said. ""That's part of his development, too. He doesn't need to make the nastiest pitch 0-2. He just needs to make his pitches because he's plenty good enough. He gets to see that guy score and it goes in the back of his mind for next time.""
Sanchez was discovered serendipitously in late 2014 when Phillies special assignment scout Bart Braun was sent to the Dominican Republic to look at a catcher. A converted shortstop, Sanchez was summoned along with several others to throw batting practice to the catcher. The Phillies never signed the catcher.
""They signed me five days later,"" Sanchez said.
Marty Malloy, the first-year manager at Lakewood, had the same reaction as most in the Phillies' organization when he saw Sanchez throw for the first time in spring training.
""Wow,"" Malloy said. ""I mean, wow. He has the wow factor. Electric stuff. Day one when you see him you saw wow. He's that guy. He's way beyond his years.""
That is obvious. It's equally apparent that the Phillies are in need of some ""wow"" and ""electric stuff"" in Philadelphia. So what's the estimated time of arrival for fast-working Sixto?
""I expect to be there in two or three years, God permitting,"" Sanchez said.
Sooner would be even better.
bbrookover@phillynews.com
@brookob

5 lutego rywalizowali chłopcy i dziewczęta  urodzeni w 2006 i młodsi, natomiast 6.02 urodzeni w 2003-2004-2005 r.
Łącznie w dwudniowej rywalizacji uczestniczyło 208 zawodników i zawodniczek z 25 szkól naszego  województwa.

6.02.2019

5.02.2019

Zwycięzcy zawodów:

6.02.2019
Rywalizacja odbywała sie w ramach Wojewódzkich Igrzysk Młodzieży Szkolnej dziewcząt i chłopców urodzonych w latach: 2003-2005.
W klasyfikacji szkół chłopców tym razem pierwsze miejsce zajęli chłopcy z SP Jedlicze, natomiast wśród dziewcząt z SP Nr 2 - NSS Ustrzyki Dolne.
W klasyfikacji indywidualnej zwyciężali:

Postanowienia końcowe:
© Wszelkie prawa zastrzeżone, Ustrzycki Serwis Sportowy"
"
Chelsea should take caution from Liverpool's shock defeat to Red Star Belgrade when the Londoners take on BATE Borisov on Thursday, according to Mateo Kovacic.
The Blues currently boast a perfect record in their Europa League campaign, having won all three of their encounters in Group L.
BATE, meanwhile, lie rock bottom of their group, with just one point from a possible nine.
Liverpool, however, went into their Champions League clash on Tuesday with similar confidence,
but were outplayed in a 2-0 defeat at the hands of Red Star
.
And Kovacic warned that the same could happen in Belarus should Chelsea take the fixture lightly.
""I watched the game and Liverpool struggled a lot. In Belgrade the atmosphere is tough. It's difficult to play there, like it will be here as well,"" the Croatia international, currently on loan at Stamford Bridge from Real Madrid, told reporters.
""These are games where you need to concentrate a lot or you will lose the game.
""The most important thing is we need to be prepared so that what happened to Liverpool doesn't happen to us.""
Chelsea are juggling a few fitness concerns going into their Europa League clash on Thursday
.
Manager Maurizio Sarri has confirmed that both Alvaro Morata and Cesc Fabregas would be left behind in England for the game, the striker given a rest while his compatriot recovers from illness.
There should be playing time for Eden Hazard, however, who is recovering from a back injury and reappeared at the weekend after missing two games."
"
Det tager lang tid at finde Danmark bedste sportsbook. Du skal oprette en konto hos alle sportsbooks i Danmark, som har dansk tilladelse fra Spillemyndigheden. Herefter skal du lave indbetalinger til hver enkelt konto, og du skal afprøve bookmakernes services, herunder velkomstbonus, odds og kundebetjening. Du skal løbende holde øje med de tilbud, som den pågældende sportsbook oplyser om i nyhedsbreve eller på deres hjemmeside, og du skal vurdere, om der er værdi heri, kombineret med odds på relevante sportsbegivenheder. Endelig skal du vurdere deres udbetalingssystem, herunder udbetalingsmetoder og den tid, det tager. Det er klart, at man som nybegynder står over for et næsten uoverkommeligt projekt, og mange ender da sikkert også med at tage den første den bedste. Men hvorfor ikke benytte sig af den viden, som allerede er tilgængelig på nettet? Vi har nemlig gjort arbejdet for dig her på Sportsbook.dk. Nedenfor har vi således udvalgt Danmarks bedste sportsbook - og nr. 2 og nr. 3 også. Det er nemlig fint at have omkring 3 sportsbook at vælge mellem, hvis man gerne vil spille lidt mere seriøst. Inden du går videre med din karriere som sportsbook-haj, så gør dig selv en tjeneste. Opret en konto her, hvis du ikke allerede har det:
Unibet er en solid, skandinavisk bookmaker med fremragende odds og support, og de har vundet flere priser som årets sportsbook. Deres forskellige platforme, herunder også til mobil og livebetting, fungerer upåklageligt, og Unibet scorer topkaraktere på alle parametre. Derfor er de Danmarks bedste sportsbook!

.
Betfair er nu også en sportsbook, men deres oprindelige forretningsidé var som spillebørs, hvor spillere indgår væddemål med hinanden. Du tilgår let begge muligheder via hjemmesiden, og det er ensbetydende med, at du næsten altid kan finde nogle af markedets bedste odds. Kundeservice er også helt i top, så vi har at gøre med en sportsbook (og spillebørs), der står på spring til at blive nr. 1, så Unibet må hele tiden være helt fremme i skoene.

.
Betsafe er en skandinavisk funderet sportsbook, og det er faktisk i sig selv et kvalitetstegn. Det betyder nemlig, at målgruppen blandt andet er danskere - og det er vi jo glade for. De har et imponerende produkt, der fungerer rigtig godt. Odds er også klart godkendte, og kundeservice er både professionel og hurtig. Betsafe er derfor naturligt at finde i vores top 3 over Danmarks bedste sportsbooks, og fortsætter den gode stil, er der ikke langt til toppen!

.
Sidens indhold er fuldt reklamefinansieret, og selv om vi kan stå på mål for indholdet, skal du være opmærksom på, at vi modtager betaling for at henvise spillere til spillesider. Alt materiale skal derfor opfattes som ANNONCERING! Endvidere skal du være opmærksom på, at bonusser er underlagt regler og vilkår. Spil ansvarligt eller søg hjælp!"

1 Min Read
LONDON (Reuters) - Cardiff City centre back Sol Bamba will miss the rest of the season after he suffered a knee ligament injury at the weekend, the Premier League strugglers said on Tuesday.
The news is a major blow for a club 18th in the league, two points behind 17th-placed Southampton, and battling to avoid relegation after three successive defeats.
“Unfortunately, our biggest fears have been confirmed regarding the injury Sol suffered at Wolves on Saturday,” manager Neil Warnock told the club website.
“Scans have shown that Sol has ruptured his ACL; he will have an operation on Wednesday and therefore miss the rest of the season.”
Bamba was carried off the pitch on a stretcher during the first half of the 2-0 defeat at Wolverhampton Wanderers on Saturday.
The 34-year-old Ivory Coast international has scored four  goals this season and played in all but one of Cardiff’s 29 league games.
Reporting by Alan Baldwin, editing by Ed Osmond
All quotes delayed a minimum of 15 minutes. See
here for a complete list
of exchanges and delays.
©
2019
Reuters. All Rights Reserved."

Jamestown High School boys basketball is ranked second in the first Class A basketball poll.
Fargo Davies received the most first-place votes (15), followed by the Blue Jays (2) and West Fargo Sheyenne (1). Jamestown (1-0) is coming off a 83-49 victory over Bismarck St. Mary's on Tuesday night and will play (RV) Bismarck High on the road Friday.
The Blue Jay girls (1-0) also recieved votes during the Class A poll and will also play the Demons on Friday evening.
Class A Basketball Polls
Boys
Team	Rec.	Pts.
1. Davies (15)	2-0	84
2. Jamestown (2)	1-0	70
3. W.F. Sheyenne (1)	2-0	55
4. Minot	1-0	24
5. Century	1-1	21
Others receiving votes: Mandan (1-1), Legacy (1-0), Bismarck High (1-1).
Girls
Team	Rec.	Pts.
1. Century (18)	2-0	90
2. Mandan	1-0	71
3. Devils Lake	1-0	47
4. Bismarck		1-0	31
5. Shanley		2-0	22
Others receiving votes: Legacy (1-0), Jamestown (1-0), W.F. Sheyenne (1-1), Fargo Davies (1-1).
Optimist Club weekly athletes
Aden Braun, Haley Nelson, Boden Skunburg Isabel Wedell and Chumkaur Dhaliwal were named Optimist Club athletes of the week.
Braun, an 8th grader on the Jamestown High School wrestling team, pinned all four of his opponents to clinch his first-ever championship in the 106-pound division Saturday at the Knights of Columbus tournament at Jerry Meyer Arena. Nelson, a freshman on the JHS gymnastics team, won the bars, vaults and all-around during a dual with Aberdeen (S.D.) last Thursday. Skunberg, a junior on the Blue Jay boys basketball team, scored 36 points during a 83-49 victory over Bismarck St. Mary's on Tuesday.
Wedell, a junior from Ellendale on the University of Jamestown volleyball team, helped lead the Jimmies to a 2-1 record at the NAIA national tournament with 30 kills. Dhaliwal, a junior from Hayward, Calif., on the UJ men's wrestling team, placed third at the Dragon Open on Saturday after pinning three opponents.
Jimmie volleyball finishes 18th
The University of Jamestown volleyball team was ranked 18th in the Dec. 5 NAIA women's volleyball coaches' postseason top 25 poll. The Jimmies moved up six spots after going 3-1 in postseason play."

lunedì – venerdì 9.00 – 18.30
sabato 9.00 – 17.00
Maria-Theresien-Straße 39
6020 Innsbruck
T.
+43 512 589144
store manager
Hjalmar Comploy
Con i suoi 2.000 metri quadri è il più grande negozio di sport di montagna del Tirolo.
Questi sono i mondi principali: escursionismo, arrampicata su roccia, arrampicata su ghiaccio, scialpinismo, viaggio, campeggio.
Stiamo parlando di circa 120 anni di storia dello sport a Innsbruck. Più di 20 anni fa, SPORTLER ha acquisito l’azienda Sport Witting. E la storia di successo continua. Con collaboratori entusiasti, consulenza competente e un servizio all’avanguardia.
Da sottolineare anche il nuovo concetto shop in shop, tra l’altro nel nuovo Alpine Flagship Store troverai il primo Patagonia Shop dell’Austria.
Le montagne, le Alpi, le mucche al pascolo. Natura allo stato puro. Susy e Wilma, Camilla e Guendalina pascolano tranquille al sole. Tu invece, prima passi da noi in negozio per scegliere l’attrezzatura giusta per le tue avventure in montagna. Lì, per sprigionare il tuo entusiasmo potrai saltare in alto e far suonare le campane. Non scherziamo, è un invito serio. Hai il coraggio di farlo? Non vediamo l’ora di sentire il tuo concerto.
Sia in estate che in inverno lo sportivo appassionato di montagna sogna avventure in alta quota. Per avere la giusta combinazione di divertimento e sicurezza è necessaria un’attrezzatura adeguata. Ed ecco che entriamo in gioco noi di SPORTLER. Dall’imbrago ai moschettoni, dal casco ai ramponi, dagli sci da scialpinismo agli zaini antivalanga. Anche per quanto riguarda l’abbigliamento, nella nostra filiale avrai solo l’imbarazzo della scelta. Vieni a scoprire la nostra vasta gamma di articoli!
Nella filiale di Innsbruck si avvera la favola della scarpa giusta per ognuno. Qui si trova infatti il reparto calzature più grande del Tirolo. Tutti i tuoi desideri saranno sodisfatti. Scarpe da avvicinamento, scarpette da arrampicata, scarpe da trailrunning, scarpe da trekking, scarponi, sandali outdoor. Per uomo, donna e bambino, per ogni esigenza e per ogni gusto. Un passo dopo l’altro raggiungerai ogni cima, non importa quanto alta sia.
Hai poco tempo, ma sai esattamente di cosa hai bisogno? Allora il nostro servizio Click & Collect è perfetto per te. Acquista i tuoi prodotti desiderati online e ritirali nel tuo negozio preferito.
I tuoi vantaggi?
• Risparmi tempo.
• Non è necessario essere a casa per ricevere il pacco.
• È possibile provare i prodotti in negozio.
• La taglia non è quella giusta? I nostri esperti saranno felici di aiutarti.
• E… il servizio è gratuito."

ou le
snowboard

casques
, masques, Dva conçu aussi bien pour les amateurs de glisse que pour les skieurs confirmés. Besoin d’une nouvelle
veste de ski
imperméable et respirante, d’un pantalon ou de sous-vêtements techniques pour vous protéger du froid en montagne ? Profitez de la
nouvelle collection skiwear

Beim Versand durch Amazon nutzen Verkaufspartner die Logistik der Amazon-Versandzentren: Amazon verpackt und verschickt die Artikel und übernimmt den Kundenservice.
Ihre Vorteile:
(1) Lieferung  ab 29 EUR Bestellwert (Bücher, Bekleidung und Schuhe generell versandkostenfrei, auch zusammen mit Media-Produkten). (2) Kombinieren und sparen - bestellen Sie bei Amazon.de oder Verkaufspartnern, die den Versand durch Amazon nutzen, wird Ihre Bestellung zu einer Lieferung zusammengefasst. (3) Alle Artikel sind mit Amazon Prime für noch schnellere Lieferung bestellbar.
Wenn Sie Verkäufer sind, kann Versand durch Amazon Ihnen dabei helfen, Ihre Umsätze zu steigern.

Sports Cappers Picks
Sports Handicapping Predictions
October 31, 2018
by
The Wiesguy
Leave a Comment

Looking for
Oklahoma Sooners vs. Texas Tech Red Raiders
free picks?
Week 10 betting
sees the
Sooners
taking on the
Red Raiders
on Saturday November 3rd at Jones AT&T Stadium in Lubbock, Texas. Cappers Picks provides complimentary handicapping picks all NCAA football season long so stay tuned for more FREE college football predictions like this Oklahoma Texas Tech free pick.
(7-1)
Oklahoma Sooners
vs.
Texas Tech Red Raiders
(5-3)
Date: Saturday, November 3rd 2018
Time: 8:00 pm EST
Venue: Jones AT&T Stadium, Lubbock Texas
NCAA Football Spread: Sooners -13.5
NCAA Betting Total: 77
Live CFB Odds
Updated Sportsbook Bonuses For Today
Click here to view…
CFB ATS Stats
&
NCAAF Betting Insight for this game!
Oklahoma is still in the playoff picture but they have to keep winning and they need some help. This is a game where they are going to have to score some points. They should not have too much resistance though.
Texas Tech is always an upset candidate if they can just play a little defense. They will be able to move the ball and score points against Oklahoma and they are equipped to play catchup if necessary.
Since their lone loss to Texas the Sooners have scored 50+ points in back to back wins. They are now in a tie atop the Big 12 with the Longhorns and West Virginia, who they play the last week of the season. Until they they just have to stay focused.
If the Heisman doesn’t come from Alabama Kyler Murray is as good a bet as any. He has been sensational this season and with his athleticism seems to make about one highlight reel play per quarter. He is fun to watch and should put up numbers in this one.
All season long you have been able to score on the Sooners. The problem is their offense puts so much pressure on you that you can’t really take a series off. They are yielding 25ppg but scoring almost double that. They may have to to win on the road at night.
The Red Raiders are still looking for one more win to become bowl eligible. This is a tough spot to get it and when you look at the schedule they might have to wait til the final week against Baylor. If they miss there is no way the coach is back.
Texas Tech only knows one way to attack, through the air. Alan Bowman is having a monster season made only more impressive by the fact that he missed most of their loss to West Virginia and has been playing hurt since.
Their own defense has been super porous too which is why it seems there is no way this game is not a shootout. Kyler Murray should light them up but just one stop or turnover could be the difference. I am just not sure they can do it.
It is hard to see this one as anything less than one of the biggest offensive games of the season.  There will not be a lot of incompletions as both teams race up and down the field.
I think we are going to be pretty confident about this one cashing by halftime with at least one team already in the 30s. Maybe both.
Oklahoma could use some style points if they are going to make a playoff push and I don’t see Texas Tech slowing things down if they are able to get any sort of lead.
Week 10 Free Score Prediction: Oklahoma 55 – Texas Tech 38
If you’re looking for more picks like this Oklahoma Sooners vs. Texas Tech Red Raiders matchup we’ll be providing 4* free College football game predictions on the blog all bowl season long, and check out our Experts for guaranteed premium &
free CFB Football picks
!

: I found these on cyxus.com and they have been life savers for my headaches while looking at my phone or the computer. They are blue light blocking and amazing!
Lynn Topaz: Definitely helps with screen migraines and eye strains. I definitely feel a difference when I wear these versus my regular glasses or no glasses at all when looking at a screen. These glasses are comfy and I have been able to use them regularly. I cannot tell if these have helped me improve my sleep or not but they definitely help with eye strain. I can blink at a regular pace with these glasses (versus how people normally spend longer staring when looking at a screen). The packaging was perfect. Everything is as advertised. The glasses come with a Cyxus lens case with a lens cloth. It also comes with the blue light pointer and blue light indication card as shown in the demonstration video. On the back of the card is a warranty. The glasses came in a nice solid box. Excellent product. Style does not look too bad. Recommend for anyone who would like long term eye protection from staring at a screen.

Chi ama lo sport, troverà presso Arenas Resort Tirreno un mare di opportunità: di qualunque tipo e per qualunque età, anche noi amiamo lo sport! Presso il Resort vi attendono molte possibilità gratuite di fare sport. Potrete approfittare anche di interessanti offerte a pagamento.
A vostra disposizione gratuitamente:
Offerte a pagamento:
Gli appassionati di tennis e tutti coloro che vorrebbero diventarlo da noi trovano una struttura di livello professionale: quattro nuovi campi da doppio, erba artificiale con intaso di sabbia quarzifera e illuminazione. Il contrasto cromatico (fondo rosso con bordi verdi) è ideale per giocare sotto il sole del Mediterraneo.
Vi piacerebbe prendere lezioni da maestri professionisti?
Offriamo lezioni di tennis sia in italiano sia in altre lingue per tutti i livelli e tutte le età. Sunball Tennis è il partner ufficiale di tutte le lezioni di tennis presso Arenas Resort Tirreno. Il metodo di insegnamento delle più grandi scuole di tennis internazionali del settore turistico, con sedi in otto paesi, si basa sull'innovativo concetto di “Play & Stay” della ITF (International Tennis Federation). Tutti i maestri sono fortissimi, dotati di licenza e parlano più lingue.
Offerta:
In primavera e in autunno le biciclette dominano la scena. All'Arenas Resort Tirreno e dintorni, gli esperti operatori svizzeri Bikeholiday e BICI organizzano vacanze attive molto amate. Un team collaudato accompagna gruppi ben scelti lungo itinerari mozzafiato. Se preferite, potrete naturalmente scoprire queste affascinanti zone da soli: basta noleggiare una bici e partire alla scoperta del territorio!
Cicloturismo organizzato:
Potrete scoprire le date esatte e ulteriori informazioni
qui
.
Oltre alle vacanze organizzate di cicloturismo:
Una natura incontaminata e panorami da sogno sul Mediterraneo, da godere secondo il vostro ritmo personale. Proprio davanti all’hotel partono itinerari per escursioni e running che vi consentono di scoprire l’affascinante paesaggio e la ricca vegetazione della costa sarda orientale.
Potete camminare a passo tranquillo, allenarvi secondo la vostra tabella di marcia personale oppure in gruppo. Vi forniremo tutte le informazioni su itinerari e opportunità di allenamento.
Vacanze organizzate di escursionismo e running:
Potrete scoprire le date esatte e ulteriori informazioni
qui
.
La sontuosa Costa Smeralda in Sardegna vi attende per scoprire i tanti itinerari a disposizione. In programma ogni settimana lezioni di pattinata, curve, frenata, tecniche di caduta e doppia spinta. L'allenamento di resistenza, le tattiche di gara e le uscite in gruppo diventeranno un piacere. In parte, verrà utilizzato un autobus per gli spostamenti, per poter abbreviare alcune tappe.
Questa offerta è rivolta solo alle ferie organizzate su pattini. Potrete scoprire le date esatte e ulteriori informazioni
qui
.
Con il mare a pochi passi, chi ama l’acqua ha solo l’imbarazzo della scelta: farsi cullare piacevolmente tra le dolci onde, preferire una gita in mare o magari un'esplorazione in immersione? Godetevi le acque cristalline dalle mille sfumature d’azzurro della Baia di Orosei.
La nostra offerta:
Diving Center
Per corsi (PADI) e immersioni avete a disposizione una scuola sub esterna nelle vicinanze. Un panorama subacqueo estremamente interessante vi attende nella zona costiera protetta attorno a Cala Liberotto, anche grazie ai tanti relitti risalenti alla seconda guerra mondiale.
Per maggiori informazioni,
oroseidivingcenter.com
.

Задача  коллектива организация досуга, участие в городских концертах и мероприятиях ЦКС. С участниками коллектива ведутся танцевальные, индивидуальные занятия. Помимо разучивания различных вариаций индивидуально  ведется работа с ансамблем.

Руководитель коллектива пользуется своей методикой, которая основывается на правильной технике в хореографии. Ведётся воспитательная работа, клуб посещает концерты различных коллективов.

Клуб «Виктори-Денс» принимал участие во многих мероприятиях города например:  Деловая игра «Один в один»; Открытый чемпионат по танцевальному спорту на кубок «Газпром добыча Уренгой» г.Новый-Уренгой ,где участники коллектива заняли три первых места, два вторых, одно третье место; Принимали участие на «Встрече выпускников» в колледже, там же была выездная концертная программа; В концертной программе посвященной Дню Защитника Отечества;  На российском турнире «Кубок Ямал - Югра"" г. Ноябрьск.

Так же ансамбль принимал участие в Открытом турнире по танцевальному спорту «Кубок Альянса» в городе Новый Уренгой и привезли много наград: 1 место – 4 пары (8 человек), 2 место – 4 пары (8 человек), 3 место – 4 пары (8 человек).



Ансамбль спортивного бального танца «Виктори-Денс» планирует принимать активное участие в различных  мероприятиях города.
В 2008 году  Виктору Вениаминовичу было присвоено звание «Заслуженный Мастер Спорта России». В основном составе ансамбля формейшн « Вера » является пятикратным чемпионом России по европейской программе и пятикратным серебряным призером по латиноамериканской программе, бронзовый призер чемпионата мира 2001г (Германия) по европейской программе, серебряный призер чемпионата мира 2002г (Молдова) по европейской программе, финалист чемпионата мира по латиноамериканской программе (Литва), серебряным призером чемпионата Европы 2003г (Молдова) и бронзовым призером на чемпионате Мира 2003г (Германия) по европейской программе, серебряный призер чемпионата Европы 2004г (Молдова)  и финалист чемпионата Мира по европейской программе, финалист чемпионата Европы и Мира 2005 год (Германия) по латиноамериканской программе, чемпионом мира 2006 года.
Адрес: г. Губкинский, мкр.7, дом 3
Телефон:
+7 (34936) 5-39-98,
+7 (34936) 5-38-50
+7 (34936) 5-34-63
E-mail:
cks@mogub.yanao.ru

© 2019 МБУ «ЦКС г.Губкинского». ВСЕ ПРАВА ЗАЩИЩЕНЫ.

Per la sfida di lunedì contro i veneti potrebbe registrarsi un nuovo record di pubblico.
Un rigore del numero 10 etneo basta per battere i bianconeri di Torrente.
Colpo di testa vincente del bomber granata, espugnato il difficile campo del ""Razza"".
""Se il Palermo mi propone un nuovo contratto rimango""
Le dichiarazioni rilasciate dalla moglie-agente del capitano nerazzurro.
Rumors diversi ogni giorno, i tifosi temono nuove scottature e ""dimenticano"" la corsa per la...
Il presidente del club rosanero fa il punto sulla trattativa col fondo americano York Capital...
Con il bosniaco assente per squalifica il tecnico rosanero pensa a rispolverare il 4-4-2 con...
Il vademecum per la società americana prima di chiudere l'affare: a gestire il tutto sarà Oliva.
Paladini promossi se vincono e Roma perde a Legnano: le parole prepartita del coach.
Il figlio dell’Etna e talentuoso giocatore torna a vestire i suoi colori, quelli...
Completata la rosa 2019 della società etnea
A fine partita, coach Peppe Dato è una furia.
Le dichiarazioni del tecnico granata in vista della trasferta col Rende
Parlano due tra i protagonisti della vittoria granata contro il Potenza.
""Non meritavamo di perdere e, sotto il profilo agonistico, non potevo chiedere di più ai miei...
Le parole del numero uno del club bianconero
Calogero Di Carlo (Presidente Real Cefalù Uniolympo): “Ero sicuro che avremmo stupito, questa...
Gara, quella sempre condotta dalle padrone di casa, che si sono aggiudicate il match con pieno...
Paola Novati: “Sappiamo  che è una partita importante e la stiamo preparando nel migliore...
Regate previste sul golfo di Mondello dal 25 al 28 aprile."

Du magst Sport? Du stehst auf Fussball, verfolgst Eishockey und verpasst kein Tennis-Match? Dich interessieren die Hintergründe zu deinem Lieblings-Team? Du willst mehr Live-Sport? Dann bist du bei uns genau richtig. SPORTAL HD ist das einzige deutschsprachige Sport-Streaming-Angebot, das deine Live-Sport-Highlights mit exklusiven Channels, Talks, Magazine und Newsformaten kombiniert.​
Ob UEFA Champions League Topspiele, heisse Formel1 Überholmanöver, Krachende Checks im Ei​s​hockey, Highspeed bei Skirennen, angesagte News aus dem Sport und Experten-Talks oder Sportmagazine – all das läuft bei dir mit SPORTAL HD.​ Das Angebot kann sich aus rechtlichen Gründen in deinem Land (Deutschland, Schweiz und Österreich) unterscheiden.​​
Auf Tablet oder Smartphone, Desktop oder deinem SmartTV, SPORTAL HD gibt es überall und gratis! SPORTAL HD ist eine rein Werbefinanzierte Plattform und bietet dir im Jahr über 10.000 Livestream - 4free!
Lehn‘ dich im Livestream bequem zurück und lass dich unterhalten - oder bestimme mit dem umfangreichen Videoangebot selbst, was du wann sehen willst: Dein Programm, dein SPORTAL HD - PURE SPORTS - PURE ENTERTAINMENT!"
"
Landstede Basketbal heeft donderdagmiddag in een goed gevuld Theater van de Sport met 80-66 gewonnen van Den Helder Suns. De Zwolse spelers hadden in de afgelopen week de studenten van Landstede persoonlijk uitgenodigd voor het oefenduel in eigen huis en die studenten gaven massaal gehoor aan de oproep.
Beide teams treden bepaald niet op volle oorlogssterkte aan. De Luxemburgse international Alex Laurent ontbreekt bij de gasten, terwijl aan Zwolse zijde de lange mannen Olaf Schaftenaar, Kevin Bleeker en Noah Dahlman aan de kant blijven. Verheugend is dat de Canadese guard Kaza Kajami-Keane zijn debuut maakt. Na een vlucht vanuit Zuid-Amerika is de spelverdeler nog niet okselfris, maar hij toont wel meteen zijn klasse.
De Canadees strooit met fraaie passes en zijn drives naar de basket zijn dodelijk effectief. Niet elke bal komt even precies aan, omdat de spelers en hij nog aan elkaar moeten wennen. Ook de gevestigde spelers passen soms naar plaatsen waar geen medespeler te vinden is. Via 26-22 is het rust bij 42-37. Dat zal de Heldenaren matig bevallen, want met een krappe twee minuten op de klok stond het nog 31-35. Toen kwam Keane en schoot vervolgens Sherron Dorsey-Walker een driepunter vanuit de hoek.
In de tweede helft is het allemaal wat slordiger. De vele trainingsuren eisen hun conditionele tol en de zorgvuldigheid neemt wat af. Dat neemt overigens niet weg dat er nog heel wat te genieten valt. Franko House ijsbeert door de defensie, Freek Vos doet dit buffelend, maar de score van de dag komt niet op een Zwolse naam. Diep vanaf de eigen helft vliegt een driepunter door de ring. Het is 59-53. Een drietal jongeren probeert in de kwartpauze deze prestatie te herhalen, maar dat lukt hen niet, zodat de prijs nog even in de koelkast blijft.
Landstede Basketbal loopt uit naar een veilig lijkende twaalf punten voorsprong, maar de Heldenaren knokken zich terug tot vijf, mede namens een hele slordige balinname. Dan is het welletjes. Nog even gaat de gaskraan open, waarna het bij een stand van 80-66 einde oefening is.
Punten:
Franko House 23; Sherron Dorsey-Walker 14; Nigel van Oostrum 13; Kaza Kajami-Keane 9; Ralf de Pagter 9 (16 rebounds); Mike Schilder 6; Bart van Schaik 3; Freek Vos 3
Tekst: Remco van Vliet

unWest
brings the same level of professional experience and our commitment to meeting or exceeding your expectations, to each and every project - whether it's a residential lawn, an award-winning 18-hole golf course, or a 600 acre mine reclamation.  Most of our business comes from repeat customers and referrals.  We depend on satisfied customers to grow our business.
S
unWest
started with one state-of-the-art hydromulcher and in order to meet the demand for our services, each year we have acquired more new equipment including range drill seeders, turf drill seeders, and various other seeding implements.  We have also greatly expanded our line of hydromulchers.  The bottom line for our customers is that whether your project requires planting in the most rugged and remote terrain or to the exacting standards of a world-class golf course -
SunWest
has the ability and expertise to get the job done right,
every time
.

20 of 20
Lexi Coon
Vestavia Hills swim coach Oliver Aaron stands with the 400 yard freestyle relay team of Grace Uldrich, Sydney Nelson, Adeline Carroll and Dana Mays after they placed third with a time of 3:39.00.
While the season for club swimming and diving competitors is year round, members of high school teams from around the state finished off the AHSAA swim and dive season at Auburn University on Dec. 2.
Vestavia Hills High School took 17 swimmers and one diver to state, with 10 qualifying for finals.
The Rebels kicked off the swim meet with a podium finish, the first of two they would take during the finals session. The girls 200 medley relay team of junior Grace Uldrich, freshman Adeline Carroll, eighth grader Dana Mays and seventh grader Aurelie Walker swam about a second and a half faster than their seed time to go 1:50.33 and place third.
Mays and Walker went on to place fourth and fifth in the girls 200 freestyle, respectively, with teammate Sydney Nelson, a junior, taking eighth. Sophomore Nick Velezis placed 10th in the boys 200 freestyle.
Carroll then swam her first individual event for the session, the 200 individual medley, and dropped over a second and a half to place ninth, before teammates Uldrich placed seventh and Walker eighth in the girls 50 freestyle. Sophomore Sam Campbell earned 14th in the boys 50 freestyle.
Nelson was up next with her second individual event of the session and placed 14th in the girls 100 butterfly. Mays followed as her second individual event as well, with a 12th place finish in the girls 100 freestyle.
The Rebels then swam their second relay of the day, the girls 200 freestyle relay, with Nelson, Walker, Anne Lauren Ingram and Rachel Morris swimming two-tenths faster than their prelims time to claim 11th.
The boys 200 freestyle relay team of Chip Hwang, Nick Tavakoli, Campbell and Velezis placed 13th after shaving about six tenths off of their prelims results.
In the last of the individual events for the state meet, Uldrich placed eighth in the girls 100 backstroke. Carroll then placed ninth in the girls 100 breaststroke after dropping over a second from her swim in prelims.
To cap off the meet, the Rebel girls made podium again, this time in the 400 freestyle relay. The team of Uldrich, Nelson, Carroll and Mays came together and swam nearly three seconds faster than their prelims swim and finished with a time of 3:39.00 to claim third place.
All four girls were happy with their race and very excited to stand on the podium again.
“It’s always fun when you make podium, and the fact that we make it twice in one day in one state meet, who knows what’s going to come next year,” Mays said.
Swim coach Oliver Aaron said this meet helped them end the season on a high note. This was his first year coaching.
“I think the girls and the guys came out and did really well [in prelims] setting themselves up for [finals],” he said. “It was really fun; I think it was a really good meet.”
by
LEXI COON
December 6, 2017
10:21 AM
