"
Carolina Panthers
Ron Rivera recalls time with Philip Rivers
Ron Rivera spent four seasons as an assistant coach with the San Diego Chargers, 
much time to know energetic quarterback Philip Rivers.
Rivers, a North Carolina State alum who has spent his entire 13-year career with 
the Chargers, plays the game with a unique style all his own.
'His competitive fire, his spirit, his will to want to win and the verbiage he 
used: 'Gosh, golly, doggone,'"" Rivera said, when asked to recall some memories. 
When Rivers met with the San Diego media on Wednesday, he shared his impressions 
of Rivera, who coordinated a top defense for the Chargers.
""Shoot, I thought he was a heck of a coach,"" Rivers said. ""A guy that you knew 
was going to get a shot. He's done a nice job as their head coach in Carolina.""
The 34-year-old Rivers, meanwhile, continues to be one of the league's most 
effective passers. He ranks sixth in the NFL with 3,353 passing yards and fourth 
with 25 touchdowns.
""I think he's still playing at a high level,"" Rivera said. ""You watch his 
ability to read defenses and attack. He still makes great decisions and delivers 
a good football. He's got a good feel for the game. He's a tremendous 
competitor, as well. I know he's a little bit older than the last time I saw 
him, but I still respect his ability."""
"
Parales.pl - siatki ochronne materiałowe zabezpieczające osłonowe sznurkowe. Parales.pl Kontakt: 71 70 00 354
Sklep z siatkami Parales.pl
Ceny za siatkę ochronną w Parales.pl
Wszystkie zdjęcia
Siatka na okna hali sportowej sprawdzi się zarówno na dużych jak i tych mniejszych obiektach sportowych. Wymiary oczek 12 x 12 cm i grubość siatki 4 mm spowodują, że siatka zatrzyma wszystkie lecące z dużą prędkością piłki i zabezpieczy przed wybiciem szyby. Solidny i trwały materiał jakim jest polipropylen doskonale sprawdzi się montowany po wewnętrznej, jak i zewnętrznej stronie okna, jeśli zajdzie taka potrzeba. Wytrzyma wszelkie uszkodzenia mechaniczne i silne naprężenia spowodowane dużą siłą.
Więcej szczegółów
Cena brutto za m
2
:
7,20 zł

Wszystkie okna na halach sportowych i salach gimnastycznych warto zabezpieczać siatką polipropylenową. Jest to elastyczny i sprężysty termoplastyk, który z powodzeniem zatrzyma lecące piłki czy nawet inne, ostrzejsze przedmioty. Uchroni przed wybiciem szyby, a przy otwartym oknie będzie stanowić barierę dla ptaków. Siatka polipropylenowa może być zamontowana po wewnętrznej stronie okna bądź jeśli ktoś potrzebuje doskonale sprawdzi się także po jego zewnętrznej stronie.

Polipropylen jest odporny na zmienne warunki pogodowe. Silne nasłonecznienienie spowoduje utraty sprężystości czy odkształceń. Także skrajnie niskie czy wysokie temperatury nie naruszą jego struktury. Ze względu na to, że na absorbuje wody, podczas ulewnego deszczu, śniegu czy gradu także nie ulegnie rozmiękczeniu i przerwaniu. Raz założona siatka ochronna na okna sprawdzi się przez długie lata użytkowania, nawet podczas intensywnej eksploatacji. Będzie doskonałym zabezpieczeniem przez wszystkie pory roku bez konieczności dodatkowej ochrony.

Oczko siatki:
12 x 12 cm
Materiał siatki:
Siatka polipropylenowa
Grubość siatki:
4 mm
Siatka na okno, zabezpieczająca do hali sportowej
Oczko siatki:
4,5 x 4,5 cm

Siatka polipropylenowa
Grubość siatki:
3 mm
Wytrzymała siatka na okno do hali sportowej

4,5 x 4,5 cm

4 mm

"
Rourkela Railway junction is situated in Howrah-Mumbai line under South-Eastern Railway. Apart from Rourkela Station the other stations in Sundargarh District are Bondamunda, Rajgangpur , Kalunga , Kansbahal , etc. The Steel City is well connected through Railway from Howrah & Mumbai. Apart from this the city is directly connected with Delhi, Chennai, Bangalore, Ahmedabad, Ranchi, Dhanbad & Pune too.
Many goods train also pass through Rourkela every day. Rourkela is a prfit generating junction of South-Eastern Railway. From Rourkela junction one line also goes to Biramitrapur where two from Bondamunda. One more line goes from Bimalagarh to Kiriburu  .

Samurai Basket Aprilia

squadra Under

Une fenêtre sur le Monde
Situé à 45 minutes en voiture depuis Saint-Paul-lès-Dax, l’aéroport de Biarritz vous permet de voyager en France et Europe.
Depuis l’aéroport, une multitude de possibilités pour voyager s’offre à vous.
Liste des destinations depuis Biarritz :
Bruxelles, Genève, Londres, Madrid, Paris, Nice, Bâle, Helsinki, Birmingham, Southampton, Lille, Marseille, Dublin, Stockholm, Copenhague, Strasbourg.
Pour plus de renseignements, rendez-vous sur le site de
l’aéroport de Biarritz.
Situé à 1 h 20 minutes en voiture depuis Saint-Paul-lès-Dax, l’aéroport de Bordeaux Mérignac vous permet de rejoindre plus de 83 destinations.
Voyager depuis Saint-Paul-lès-Dax est facile !
Pour plus de renseignements et connaitre la liste des destinations desservies depuis Bordeaux, rendez-vous sur le site de
l’aéroport de Bordeaux.
111, Avenue du Maréchal Foch
BP 20050
40992 Saint-Paul-Lès-Dax cedex
05 58 91 20 20
Du lundi au vendredi de 8h15 à 12h et de 13h30 à 17h30"
"
Neue Saison
Sport-BH mit Print
Sport-BH mit Print von The Upside.
Farbe
:
NAVY/WHT
Zusammensetzung
THE UPSIDE ist das Go-to-Label für vielbeschäftigte Großstädter, die nicht auf ihr Workout verzichten können. Das Label wurde 2013 von Jodhi Meares und Ashlea Holdsworth gegründet. Als passionierter Yogi stellt Jodhi Meares die Leistungsfähigkeit und Funktionalität seiner stylischen Pieces in den Mittelpunkt. Wertschätzung und Anerkennung werden bei The Upside Groß geschrieben. Die Outfits des erfolgreichen Activewear-Labels bringen die Individualität und Persönlichkeit ihrer sportlichen Träger zur Geltung.
Modelmaße"
"
New York State is on the verge of one of the largest transportation projects in the nation - the replacement of the Tappan Zee Bridge. Hudson Valley residents, business owners, elected officials and environmental advocates participated in the State DOT’s ten-year, 280 meeting planning process. Through these meetings and millions of dollars of State studies, […]
Bus Rapid Transit (BRT) provides faster and more efficient service than an ordinary bus. ""These systems operate like a surface subway, say BRT advocates, but cost far less than building an actual metro."" Watch this chapter of Moving Beyond the Automobile to learn about the key features of bus rapid transit systems around the world […]
Over 315,00 bus riders cross the Hudson River each weekday. More than half of these bus riders travel through the Lincoln Tunnel but the exclusive bus lane that only operates during the morning rush hour is at capacity. Is it time to change this?
The Bx12 Select Bus Service in the Bronx gives an efficient alternative to current transit options."

Íþróttafólk Ungmennafélags Njarðvíkur 2015 var valið í í gær og það voru þau Logi Gunnarsson og Sunneva Dögg Friðriksdóttir sem voru valin. Athöfnin fór fram í sal félagsins í Íþróttamiðstöð Njarðvikur í gær.
Einnig voru valdir íþróttamenn hverrar deildar karla og kvenna. Ómar Jóhannsson m.a. var valinn knattspyrnumaður UMFN 2015 en hann var kjörin leikmaður ársins í lok sumars.
Fíkniefnaleitarhundurinn Clarissa situr ekki auðum loppum
Handtekinn með amfetamín í sokknum og lyf á víð og dreif um heimilið

Daníel Freyr stefnir hátt í áhættuleik – Áhættuakstur og vopnaþjálfun hluti af náminu

RELATIVES A LA CIRCULATION ROUTIERE APPLICABLES A TOUS LES USAGERS DE LA ROUTE"
"
I began doing triathlons in college at Florida State University. I started out doing sprints and Olympic distance races but quickly found my real passion was in the half and full Ironman distances. In the years since, I have targeted one or two races a year while working as a CPA. In 2017, my main races will be the 70.3 World Championships and a full Ironman race in hopes of qualifying for Kona.
Posted on
October 1, 2018
by
Adam McIntyre
Pushing a baby stroller is a great way to stay in shape, apparently. That is the only explanation as to why I was able to maintain any semblance of fitness throughout this year. Prior to my son being born I …
Continue reading
→
Posted on
March 30, 2017
by
Adam McIntyre
Race Reports on the Florida Challenge Triathlon and Sampson County Super Sprint The past two weekends have been a huge change in pace for me. I have not competed in a sprint triathlon since 2008 and now I was looking …

El fabricante nacional de cubiertas inició la comercialización de los FateCargo SR-260 y DR-460, dos nuevos productos específicos para el autotransporte de cargas.

Fate
, principal productora de neumáticos de Argentina, amplió su línea de productos
FateCargo
con el lanzamiento de dos nuevos neumáticos radiales para el autotransporte de cargas. Se trata de los
SR-260 y DR-460
, específicos para semis y bateas, y servicios regionales de altas prestaciones, respectivamente.
En primer lugar, el nuevo
FateCargo SR-260
está indicado
para bateas de transporte de vehículos, furgones y carretones
de media y larga distancia, y para transporte de pasajeros de corta distancia; es decir, para servicios que requieren disminuir altura y centro de gravedad. En medida
275/70 R22,5”
, cuenta con una geometría de diseño de carcasa mejorada para optimizar el perfil de contacto con el suelo, y un
diseño de banda de rodamiento con perfil extra ancho
para permitir soportar condiciones extremas de servicio.
Por su parte, el
DR-460
, diseñado para una mayor tracción, fue desarrollado para ofrecer altas prestaciones en
servicios regionales de media y larga distancia en caminos pavimentados
. Posee un nuevo diseño de banda de rodamiento de 6 costillas y tacos múltiples que brindan una tracción óptima en las más diversas condiciones de servicio. Está disponible en medida
295/80 R22,5”.
Ambos productos tienen
una carcasa de alta performance
con un tratamiento interno especial que reduce
la temperatura de trabajo
y asegura una alta durabilidad y
una mayor recapabilidad.
“A través de estos nuevos productos, Fate sigue reafirmando su liderazgo en el sector del transporte, aplicando las más avanzadas tecnologías y logrando neumáticos con prestaciones superiores y con la mejor relación de costo por kilómetro”
, afirmó
Juan Manuel Scassi
, Gerente de Producto de la Línea Transporte.
Actualmente, Fate produce
1.400 neumáticos radiales para transporte por día
, y al finalizar el proyecto de ampliación que está realizando en su planta nacional, se estima que llegará a las
1.800 unidades
. Los mismos están homologados por las principales terminales como Scania, Volvo, Mercedes-Benz e Iveco.
Tu dirección de correo electrónico no será publicada.
Los campos obligatorios están marcados con
*
Comentario
Nombre
*
Correo electrónico
*

C’est l’assemblée délibérante de la commune qui réunit l’ensemble des élus municipaux.
Voici une présentation de l’administration des finances de la commune. Vous pouvez en consulter les détails en parcourant la rubrique.
Pour tout savoir sur vos démarches administratives, pour effectuer en ligne vos recherches et vos demandes.
Présentation des institutions territoriales tels les conseils généraux et régionaux.
Voici une présentation des villes jumelées avec la commune de Vallauris Golfe-Juan.
Créée en 400, Vallauris Golfe-Juan a une histoire riche et de nombreux monuments.
Des personnalités ont séjourné à Vallauris Golfe-Juan et y ont laissé leur empreinte. Voici leurs histoires.
Le Château de Vallauris, ancien prieuré de l’Abbaye de Lérins, reconstruit au XVIè siècle est l’un des rares édifices Renaissance de la région. Il abrite le Musée National Picasso ""La Guerre et la Paix"" dans la chapelle romane, le Musée Magnelli et le Musée de la céramique.
La légende voudrait qu’à Vallauris l’origine de la céramique remonte à la nuit des temps.
Si nous en conservons des traces datant de l’antiquité, c’est au début du XVI°s, époque d’une repopulation de la ville par des familles italiennes, qu’une importante activité céramique voit le jour jusqu’à devenir l’activité principale de la ville au XVII°s.
Vallauris Golfe-Juan bénéficie de deux écoles municipales où est enseigné l’art : d’une part, l’école municipale de Musique et de Danse et d’autre part, l’école municipale des Beaux-Arts Céramique.
La bibliothèque municipale de Vallauris Golfe-Juan est installée dans les locaux de l’ancienne mairie de Vallauris où eut lieu le mariage de Picasso avec Jacqueline Roque le 2 mars 1961.
PROGRAMME SAISON ET RESEAUX SOCIAUX
Télécharger la brochure ici :
http://bit.ly/MinotaureSaison2018-2019
Tout un ensemble d’activités sportives est à la disposition des habitants et des touristes de Vallauris Golfe-Juan.
Voici la liste des équipements sportifs de la commune de Vallauris Golfe-Juan.
La baie de Golfe-Juan, lovée entre le Cap d’Antibes et les îles de Lérins est très abritée des vents ; toute la gamme des activités nautiques et balnéaires est possible : promenades en mer, farniente sur les plages de sable, plaisance et de nombreuses activités sportives.
Quatre structures peuvent accueillir votre enfant entre 3 mois et 4 ans (dont 2 à Vallauris et 2 à Golfe-Juan).
Voici un ensemble d’informations concernant les établissements scolaires  de la ville et la scolarité de vos enfants.
Voici des informations concernant la scolarité de vos enfants qui entrent au collège et au lycée.
Présentation des établissements qui peuvent accueillir vos enfants durant les mercredis, les vacances scolaires et les péri scolaire.
Le Bureau Information Jeunesse offre une information pratique et actualisée sur différents domaines ainsi qu’un accès à un cyber espace gratuit pour vos recherches.

Implication de Vallauris Golfe-Juan dans le projet CeRamICa
Vous souhaitez créer votre entreprise sur la commune de Vallauris Golfe-Juan : bienvenue sur la rubrique Entreprendre à Vallauris.
Voici une présentation de l’évolution du développement économique de la commune de Vallauris Golfe-Juan, commune soutenant l’activité et les acteurs de l’économie.
Les commerçants non sédentaires peuvent obtenir tout renseignement auprès du Service Fiscalité locale (04.97.21.60.50).
Vallauris Golfe Juan s’est dotée de divers outils de prévention et s’appuie sur un réseau de partenaires en matière de santé.
Présentation des différentes aides sociales proposées par notre commune.
Présentation des activités et des lieux dédiés aux séniors.
Voici tous les services proposés par la Mission Locale de Vallauris Golfe-Juan.
Présentation du service Politique de la ville.
Un espace mutualisé pour des services au cœur du quartier des Hauts de Vallauris
La commune de Vallauris Golfe-Juan s’est dotée d’objectifs. Elle souhaite maîtriser et organiser son territoire de manière harmonieuse afin de préserver ses sites et les équilibres locaux, dans un souci de préservation de l’environnement et de développement durable.
Les travaux en cours dans la commune de Vallauris Golfe-Juan.
En savoir plus sur les animaux en ville.
La commune de Vallauris Golfe-Juan a à coeur les préoccupations traitant de l’eau.
Vous souhaitez préserver notre environnement, voici quelques conseils pour vos déchets.
Voici la liste des parkings de la commune Vallauris Golfe-Juan.
Entre terre et mer, la commune de Vallauris Golfe-Juan est bien desservie en matière d’espace vert.
Présentation des risques environnementaux.
The technical know-how in Vallauris has attracted a great many artists that have come to learn more about the art of pottery making. Two such artists firmly placed the name of Vallauris on the map : Picasso and, more recently, Jean Marais.
Find out more about them and their work in Vallauris.

“The school children them walking and looking in. They can’t go in. What kind of thing is this?”
It was also alleged on the show that one of the persons in the shelter even has two apartment buildings but remains in the shelter and allegedly collects a government cheque for $2000 every month.
Co-host of the show, former legislator and sports icon E. Walwyn Brewley aka 'GM' suggested that the alleged apartment owner living in the Multi-Purpose Sports Complex kick out one of his tenants since his apartment was destroyed by Hurricane Irma.
Mr Brewley also said the people need to call on the Government to “do what they need to do.” This prompted Mr Smith to say if the Government can’t get the persons out of the shelter then the Governor will have to do it.
‘Sports Complex held hostage
’
The men on the radio panel found it unacceptable that after nearly six months since hurricanes Irma and Maria, persons were still living at the Multi-Purpose Sports Complex, preventing any sports from being played at the Territory’s lone indoor facility still standing following the hurricanes.
“The Sports complex is being held hostage” by persons who allegedly have alternatives, stated Mr Donovan.
“I can’t understand how you could have three or four people have a building that size hold up for months and it look like it will go right into another hurricane season,” he added.
While making reference to a resident of the Multi-Purpose Sports Complex, Mr Donovan said “Can you believe it? You have a man down there, he has two [apartment buildings] and I must be paying for light bill and all kind of things for this man…?
It was also alleged that there are persons living in the shelter collecting cheques from Government and can afford to pay rent.
It was on February 22, 2018 that Premier Dr The Honourable D. Orlando Smith (AL) announced in a statement that as of February 1, 2018 there were only 36 persons remaining in public shelters.
“More than 3,500 individuals have received financial assistance through a programme by the BVI Red Cross with support of the Government; 328 uninsured homeowners have received assistance from our Housing Programme to date. Our most vulnerable continue to receive support from our Social Development Department…” Premier Smith stated.
Former legislators are
‘non-existent
’
Meanwhile, Mr Brewley was encouraged to use his weight as a former legislator to push the Government to free up the Multi-Purpose Sports Complex so that sports leagues and programmes can resume.
“You can do that but even when you are a politician, if you are on the wrong side of the aisle they don’t study you. So when you out altogether it is like you non-existent. You could tell them what you want but you non-existent.”

The Cathedral baseball team defeated Cloquet 12-4 in the Class AA State Tournament Quarterfinals at Dick Putz Field today.  Cloquet jumped on top 2-0 before Cathedral came storming back.   Dominic Austing was the winning pitcher with 4 runs allowed in 4 innings and Tommy Auger thew 3 shutout innings to get the save.  Nate Giambruno was 3-4 for the Crusaders and Jack Schramel had 2 hits, 2 RBIs and 3 runs scored for Cathedral.
Cathedral improves to 24-0.  Cathedral advances to play either Glencoe-Silver Lake or Marshall at noon at Dick Putz Field Friday, pregame on AM 1390-the Fan at 11:50."
"
"
"
Truckee has always been the first stop off Interstate 80 when heading into the region and a place I like to make either my only stop or my last stop. It is too easy to shoot down the hill and head home when you are done.
Starting with the golf, there is an amazing collection of world class courses that are open to public play within a very short distance. The 1-2 combination of Old Greenwood and Gray’s Crossing (right across I-80 from each other) is a sensational combination.
18th fairway Old Greenwood
Old Greenwood is a Jack Nicklaus Signature course and features the Bear at his best when it comes to design. Plentiful landing areas highlight the tee shots, with the approaches demanding precise play. Gray’s was designed by Peter Jacobson and Jim Hardy. The course was originally designed as a private course, but has since opened for public usage.
Coyote Moon may be my favorite course in the area because there are no houses lining the course and no plans for the future development. The boulders spaced throughout are part of the natural landscaping that adds to the course.
The Course at Squaw Valley closes with a special 9 out in the marsh area. Stunning views of the surrounding mountains make it a memorable round, as does a cocktail on the patio area at the Resort.
18th hole Squaw Creek
The other wonderful thing about Truckee is the dining options. Twenty years ago the thought of high-end restaurants lining the Truckee downtown area would have provoked laughter. Now there are spots like Cottonwood, The PizzaBAR, Marg’s Taco Bistro, the Bar of America, Moody’s and Drunken Monkey Sushi. Those are just some of the places located around the downtown area.
The one knock against Truckee earlier was the lack of lodging, forcing people to drive all the way to Reno to find plentiful places to bunk down for the night, but even that has changed.
The Cedar House Sport Hotel – a personal favorite of mine – is one of the newer properties in a relative way, offering everything you want for the comfortable stay in winter or summer. The hotel is geared for the outdoors type, with plenty of ski storage for the winter and a bevy of guides for hiking during the summer.


Places like the Hampton Inn have also become a popular lodging destination, and there are also world famous lodging spots nearby like the Ritz Carlton at Northstar and the Resort at Squaw Creek on the Squaw Valley property.
For a town that was once considered a cowboy town known for its rodeo, Truckee has become a top-notch tourist destination.
http://www.truckee.com
High Sierra

Weitere Informationen


Am 14.06.2018 startet die Fußball Weltmeisterschaft in Russland!

Damit Spitzensportler Höchstleistungen bringen können, spielt neben dem Training auch die richtige Ernährung eine große Rolle.


Für maximale Leistung auf dem Platz ist entscheidend:
-    Kohlenhydraten für die richtige Power vor dem Spiel
-    Ausreichend Flüssigkeit durch isotone Getränke während das Spiel
-    Eiweiß und Kohlenhydrate für die Regeneration des Muskelgewebes nach dem Spiel
-    Gute Versorgung mit Vitaminen und Mineralstoffen sowie Antioxidantien in jeder Phase

March 08, 2019 at 6:00 am | 
  The Daily Inter Lake
Print Article

BUTTE — After a lackluster start to the Class AA state girls basketball tournament the day before, the Glacier Wolfpack more than made up for it on Friday, beating Billings Senior in loser-out play 52-33 at the Butte Civic Center.
Glacier will face Helena Capital at 10:30 a.m. today in the second round of loser-out action. The winner advances to the third-place game.
Glacier coach Bill Sullivan was hesitant to say that the Wolfpack were playing angry, especially after getting bounced 41-20 by Billings West on Thursday.
“It was different,” he said.
“Today we came out and just talked about being themselves and we got off to a great start in the first quarter.”
The first quarter was was an offensive explosion. Glacier scored 18 points in the opening frame, 20 in the second and and led 43-23 after three.
“Start of the game was great and to have another big quarter was great as well,” Sullivan said.
Kali Gulick broke out and scored 14 points, leading the Wolfpack’s balanced scoring attack. A total of eight Glacier players made it on the scoresheet, including Ellie Keller, who netted 13 points.
Raley Shirey grabbed nine boards and added eight points. Aubrie Rademacher and Emma Anderson each scored six.
“Kali had great game offensively,” Sullivan said. “Nice to see her do that. Our scoring was balanced and everyone was getting the ball where it needed to be. A lot of transition buckets.”
For Billings Senior, Ellie Ostermiller scored eight points.
Glacier has a chance to redeem itself and make it to the third place game
“We’re gonna take what we get and come out and battle for a win and try as hard as we can to get in the third and fourth place game,” Sullivan said.
Billings West takes on Helena High at 8:30 p.m. in the championship final. Helena pulled off a comeback to beat Capital 38-28 in semifinals on Friday after trailing 15-7 at halftime and scoring no points in the second quarter.
Glacier 					18  5  20  9  –  52
Billings Senior 			 	4  12  7  10 – 33
GLACIER – Kali Gulick 14, Ellie Keller 13, Raley Shirey 8, Aubrie Rademacher 6, Emma Anderson 6, Kenzie Williams 3, Kaylee Fritz 1, Allee Meyer 1.
BILLINGS SENIOR – Ellie Ostermiller 8, Bri McCauley 7, Brenna Linse 5, Lily Johnson 4, Olivia LaBeau 3, Bailey King 2, Jensen Keller 2, Cass Venner 2.

9 a.m. – Billings West vs. Missoula Sentinel (Butte High School)

元F1王者エマーソン・フィッティパルディの孫ピエトロ、来季はハースのテストドライバーに
現在JavaScriptが無効になっています。Carview!のすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。
JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法は
こちら
。
元F1王者エマーソン・フィッティパルディの孫であるピエトロ・フィッティパルディが、ハースのテストドライバーに就任することが発表された。またアブダビGP後のタイヤテストにもハースから参加するという。
2017年にフォーミュラV8 3.5のタイトルを獲得したフィッティパルディ。彼は今年、スーパーフォーミュラ、WEC（世界耐久選手権）、インディカーの3カテゴリーに出場した。
ピンクのマシンに、ピエトロ・フィッティパルディ「僕もお気に入り」／スーパーフォーミュラ
4月にスーパーフォーミュラの開幕戦に出場したフィッティパルディは、5月にはWECスーパーシーズンの開幕戦となるスパ・フランコルシャン6時間レースに臨んだ。しかしその予選で大クラッシュを喫し、両足骨折という重傷を負ってしまった。
フィッティパルディは7月末に行われたインディカーのミッドオハイオ戦でデイル・コイン・レーシングよりレースに復帰。インディカーには計6戦に出場し、最高位はポートランドでの9位だった。
「ハースでテストドライバーという役目に就くことができて、本当に感謝している」
「このチームに加わるチャンスを与えてくれたジーン・ハース（チームオーナー）とギュンター・シュタイナー（チーム代表）にお礼を言いたい」
「彼らはF1で素晴らしい仕事をしてきた。彼らからこの役割を打診されたというのは、本当に素晴らしいことだ」
「アブダビでVF-18に乗ることを楽しみにしている」
「僕はこの経験を持って2019年に進みたい。そして将来的にはF1のレースシートにもそれを注ぎ込みたい」
またシュタイナーは、「ピエトロ・フィッティパルディをハースF1チームに歓迎できることを嬉しく思っている。彼と仕事をするのが楽しみだ」と語った。
「彼はジュニアのオープンホイールカーでレースをしていた時から、チャンピオンシップを勝ち獲った経歴を持っている。最近ではインディカーで良い成績を残した」
「F1での最初のテストで、ピエトロがその経験を発揮できることを我々も嬉しく思っている」
「テストドライバーとしての彼の役割や、テストのフィードバックは、間違いなくハースF1チームの成長や発展に貢献するだろう」
フィッティパルディは、アブダビでのタイヤテストの初日を担当することが決まっており、2日目にはルイス・デレトラズにその役目を引き継ぐことになっている。
（motorsport.com 日本版 Scott Mitchell）

Tennis
MELBOURNE, AUSTRALIA - JANUARY 30:  Australian Open runner-up Serena Williams of the United States speaks on stage after losing the Women's Singles Final to Angelique Kerber of Germany on day 13 of the 2016 Australian Open at Melbourne Park on January 30, 2016 in Melbourne, Australia.  (Photo by Michael Dodge/Getty Images)
February is recognized as Black History Month. It is a time to reflect on the importance and accomplishments of African-Americans in history. Serena Jameka Williams had an opportunity to become recognized this February but failed. Unless you are new to the planet earth, you know that Serena is black and has been the best tennis player in the last 10 years. She is ranked number one in the world for women and has won 21 Grand Slam titles in the Open Era. The Open Era began in 1968 when the Grand Slam tournaments agreed to allow professional players to compete with amateurs. Before 1968 only amateurs were allowed to compete in Grand Slam tournaments.  The four Grand Slam or major tournaments consist of the Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, and U.S. Open. Serena trails Steffi Graf by one title in the Open Era and three behind Margaret Court overall. How did Serena fail considering the list of all-time greats she is on?
August 2015 began with Serena entering the U.S. Open as the heavy favorite to win the title. She was the reigning Grand Slam champion for the four majors. If she wins the U.S. Open, she would have won all four major tournaments and thus complete the calendar year Grand Slam. Serena started off the tournament great, only losing one match on her way to the quarterfinals. In that quarterfinal match, she faced her big sister Venus Williams. It was a classic matchup with Serena prevailing 6-2, 1-6, 6-3. Serena’s path to another title seemed imminent with only two matches to win. She would face an unranked Roberta Vinci in the semifinals. Then on September 11
th
the unthinkable happened, Serena lost! Vinci beat her 2-6, 6-4, 6-4. With the lost, it ended the chance of tying Steffi Graf record of 22 titles. It also meant the Australian Open wouldn’t have the luster of her breaking the record.
January 2016 would find Serena favored to win the Australian Open and tie the Open Era record. She would breeze through to the quarterfinals and face her “rival” Maria Sharapova. The word rival is loosely used because Serena has won 19 of 21 matches and 18 straight verse Sharapova. It’s only a rival because the media makes it one. After Serena dismantled her 6-4 6-1, it was on to the semifinals. She would face 4
th
ranked Victoria Radwanska and beat her 6-0 6-4. At this point, Serena was basically a lock to defeat 7
th
ranked Angelique Kerber in the finals and win her seventh Australian Open title. January 30, 2016 history was not made for Serena. It was too many unforced errors that caused her to lose the match 6-4, 3-6, 6-4.
February 1
st
2016 was supposed to be a coronation of Serena as the best tennis player ever in the Open Era. It would also be a celebration of her being the greatest black tennis player ever. However, those dreams were derailed. Serena still has three more majors this year to tie and break the record. At 34 years of age, she even has a couple years to break the all-time record. The chances of her doing that are great. For 2016 and this Black History Month it comes down to – could have, should have, would have been.

DNASportsTalk.com
View all posts by Don Stenson

Csak nem akar összejönni az az exkluzívitás.
Pár hete olvashattátok nálunk is, hogy az új IKONIK skinnel sikerült egy hatalmas hibát elkövetnie az Epic Games-nek, mivel véletlenül az összes Samsungos játékosnak bekerült egy órára a boltba a skin, így rengetegen lecsaptak rá 0 dollárért.

Ezt később sikerült megoldani és meg a játékosok is megtarthatták a skint. Ezek után nem gondoltuk volna, hogy még egyszer sikerül szinte ugyanazt eljátszani, de a Samsung és az Epic ránk cáfolt. A napokban kiderült, hogy nem csak valódi S10-ekkel, de emulátorokkal is megszerezhetjük a skint.
A telefonemulátorokat leginkább arra használhatjuk, hogy PC-n nem elérhető játékokkal játszunk a gépünkön. Sokan például Clash Royale-t vagy hasonló népszerű játékokat játszanak csak éppen egérrel és sokkal nagyobb képernyőn. Úgy tűnik, hogy a Fortnite-ban is vannak ilyen játékosok, az egyikük pedig rájött, hogyha egy S10-et emulál, akkor megszerezheti a skint. Egyszerűen csak fel kellett menni a Samsung oldalára, ahonnan ingyen letölthettük a legújabb S10 emulátort és már be is zsebelhettük a skint, persze csak 1-2 óra várakozás után, mivel rengetegen próbálkoztak ezzel a metódussal az éjjel folyamán.
Természetesen, azért kell végig múlt időben beszélni, mivel a Samsung elhárította a problémát és már nem lehet így megszerezni az IKONIK-ot, de most döntést kell hozniuk, hogy elveszik a skineket, vagy megint mindenki megtarthatja, aki elég szemfüles volt.


Mostantól regisztrálhatsz az Esport1 oldalára, ahol értékes nyereményekkel és nyereményjátékokkal várunk! Legyél te is egy exkluzív közösség tagja!
Olyan gyorsan tűnt el a HP-ja, hogy hirtelen dupla annyira emelték.
Nem kellett sokat várni a javításokra, de már új hibák is felütötték a fejüket.
Úgy néz ki, hogy a nepáli és indiai példa egyre több nemzetnek tetszik meg.
Kezdődik elölről Kevin tombolása!?
Gratuláluk Szintet Léptél!"
"
O técnico Roberto Mancini mostrou, no treino do Inter de Milão desta terça-feira, que está com a pontaria afiada. Totalmente sem ângulo, ele abusou do efeito em um chute e marcou um belo gol. Veja no vídeo abaixo.

O Inter de Milão, de Mancini, não faz uma boa temporada. É apenas o quarto colocado do Campeonato Italiano com 64 pontos, 24 a menos do que o líder Juventus. Neste sábado, encara o Empoli, em casa."
"
Screenshot
Ovog nas vikenda očekuje vrlo zanimljiv, ali i za tešku diviziju UFC-a vrlo bitan, obračun između Juniora dos Santosa i Derricka Lewisa na FN priredbi u Wichiti.
“Crna zvijer” je u najavi meča JDS-a okarakterizirao kao najlošijeg protivnika do sada, a Lewis smatra da meč može završiti u bilo kojem trenutku – kada to poželi! U odgovoru Lewisu bivši prvak nije ostao dužan, dapače…
“Mogu dominirati u ovom meču neovisno gdje će se on odvijati. Bolji sam jednostavno od njega. Na nogama sam bolji borac od njega, jednako tako je i na podu. To je ono u što vjerujem i to ću nametnuti tijekom dvoboja”, izjavio je Brazilac za MMAJunkie.
Dos Santos je svjestan da meč s Lewisom neminovno donosi veliku opasnost od nokauta, ali planira biti izuzetno pažljiv i koncentriran.
“Da, on je opasan. Nikako ga ne potcjenjujem. Ali i ja moram imati mnogo vjere u vlastite sposobnosti i moram vjerovati da ga mogu pobijediti. Znam da je velik, znam da posjeduje mnogo snage. Ali znam i da je velika meta za udaranje…”
Pobjedom protiv Lewisa JDS bi bio na korak do izazivačke pozicije. Vjeruje da u njemu ima kvalitete i svježine da još jednom stigne na tron teške kategorije.
“Spreman sam u ovom meču baciti velik broj udaraca i na koncu sam siguran da će jedan sjesti na pravo mjesto. On udara vrlo jako, posjeduje mnogo snage kojom te može nokautirati. Ali Lewis ne može udariti ono što ne može dohvatiti. A ja sam mnogo brži od njega i to ću koristiti.”
“Jako sam uzbuđen što se približavam samom vrhu, a vrh je ono gdje ja želim biti. Želim ponovno pojas u svom vlasništvu. Napravit ću sve što je potrebno da to i napravim. Ovo je samo još jedan dan na poslu za mene”, zaključuje “Cigano”.
Dos Santos u profesionalnoj karijeri ima 20 pobjeda i 5 poraza. U posljednja dva nastupa je slavio protiv Tuivase i Ivanova. Posljednji poraz mu je nanio Stipe Miočić u svibnju 2017. godine kada ga je nokautirao u prvoj rundi. Lewis se u zadnjem nastupu borio protiv Daniela Cormiera za titulu prvaka teške kategorije. Poražen je prekidom u drugoj rundi.
B.J. Penn pod istragom jer je farmeru prijetio mačetom!
Poirier velikom pobjedom u Atlanti preskočio McGregora na P4P ljestvici, Stipe Miočić izguran iz top 10
Khabib otkrio jedinu stvar koja ga privlači kod borbe s Poirierom

Gor Mahia 2:0 NA Hussein Dey,Thank you Lord  Am on today’s Scoresheet,More good things Foward ⚽️🥅 🇷🇼🇰🇪
#cafconfederationcup
#cafconfederationcup2019
#tuyisengejacques
#tuyisenge250
#sirikal
#kogalo
#makeitcount
pic.twitter.com/I0en5OhcfA
— Tuyisenge Jacques (@Tuyisenge250)
February 24, 2019

Gor started off with better early chances in the opening minutes of the game with Sammy Onyango blazing high while Jaques Tuyisenge producing a tame shot after Nicholas Kipkirui set him up on the edge of the box.
Faozi Yahya went close in the second half with his shot going past the near post with Hussein Dey looking for a draw resulted in time-wasting tactics but were punished late on.
Francis Kahata volleyed in the ball in the 84th minute after the Algerians keeper Gaya Merbah punching clearance from Shafiq Batambuze’s cross went straight to the Kenyan international and rifle into the back post.
Hussein Dey midfielder Harrag was handed a second yellow card following the goal for protesting to the referee just after the goal
Rwandese striker Tuyisenge made the game safe with a poachers strike after Batambuze intercepted header caught the Algerians flat-footed as the K’Ogalo striker raced and stuck past the keeper to the displeasure of the opposition.
Sirkal move top of the group following
Zamalek and Petro Atletico 1-1 draw
leaving the Angolan side on 4 points same as Hussein Dey with Zamalek bottom with 2 points.
Hassan Oktay Gor Mahia head coach
“They wasted time for the better part of the game and I told my players not to be distracted by the antics and had to run until the final minute. They never gave up and I knew the goal would eventually come. They fought hard and I’m happy that we managed to get the needed result at home,” Oktay was quoted by Futaa.com

This chapter explores the role of transport and travel on the health of the population of Hackney and the City of London. Local, national and regional data sources are presented alongside published literature and evidence to form the content of the chapter (accurate at the time of writing – Sep-Dec. 2016). The full chapter is available for download in pdf. format from the link below:
Transport_and_travel
(
PDF document
)
The content of this chapter is structured around the following topics:
Introduction
Health and wellbeing impacts
Local data and unmet need
Inequalities
Comparisons with other areas and over time
Evidence and good practice
Services and support
Challenges and opportunities
Adult Health and Illness
Children and young people
Infectious Diseases
Lifestyle and behaviour
Mental health and substance misuse
Society and environment
Vulnerable adults
Age
Disability
Ethnicity
Gender

"
नई दिल्लीः
इंग्लैंड के खिलाफ पहले दो टेस्ट मैचों में भारतीय क्रिकेट टीम के युवा खिलाड़ी हार्दिक पांड्या के बेहद साधारण प्रदर्शन के बाद उनकी काफी आलोचना हुई। सभी ने उनके 'ऑलराउंडर' होने पर सवाल उठाए, टीम में उनकी जगह होने पर सवाल उठाए और लगातार आलोचनाएं होती रहीं..लेकिन कप्तान विराट कोहली ने पांड्या पर अपना भरोसा बरकरार रखा और उन्हें तीसरे टेस्ट में भी टीम में शामिल किया। इस बार हार्दिक चमके भी और गरजे भी।
- पहले गेंद से मचाया धमाल
हार्दिक पांड्या ने नॉटिंघम टेस्ट की पहली पारी में इंग्लैंड की जमकर परीक्षा ली और अपनी सधी हुई गेंदबाजी से इंग्लिश बल्लेबाजों को पूरी तरह से बैकफुट पर ढकेल दिया। पांड्या ने इस पारी में कुल 6 ओवर किए जिस दौरान महज 28 रन लुटाते हुए 5 विकेट झटके। ये टेस्ट क्रिकेट की एक पारी में उनका अब तक सर्वश्रेष्ठ प्रदर्शन साबित हुआ। हार्दिक ने इस पारी में इंग्लैंड के कप्तान जो रूट, विकेटकीपर बल्लेबाज जॉनी बैरिस्टो, पिछले मैच के हीरो क्रिस वोक्स के साथ-साथ आदिल राशिद और स्टुअर्ट ब्रॉड को पवेलियन का रास्ता दिखाया।



- फिर बल्ला भी गरजा
जब दूसरी पारी में हार्दिक पांड्या बल्लेबाजी करने उतरे तब तक टीम इंडिया मजबूत स्थिति में आ चुकी थी। पांड्या ने मौके का फायदा उठाया और इस अंदाज में बल्लेबाजी की, मानो वो अपने घरेलू मैदान पर मैच खेल रहे हों। पांड्या ने 52 गेंदों पर नाबाद 52 रनों की पारी खेली जिस दौरान उनके बल्ले से 7 चौके और एक छक्का निकला। उनकी इस पारी ने अंत में स्कोर 352 रन तक पहुंचा दिया जिसके बाद भारत ने पारी घोषित कर दी।



- इस खास लिस्ट में हुए शामिल
इसके साथ ही हार्दिक पांड्या भारतीय खिलाड़ियों की उस खास लिस्ट में शामिल हो गए जिन्होंने इंग्लिश जमीन पर एक ही टेस्ट मैच में अर्धशतक भी लगाया और 5 विकेट भी लिए। ये हैं वो खिलाड़ी जिन्होंने ये कमाल किया..
क्रिकेट/खेल की खबरें

Find a lower comparable hotel price online and we'll beat it by 10%. Find out more.
*Conditions Apply
Property Location
With a stay at Le Palmyra Golf Hotel in Agde, you'll be near the airport, within a 10-minute drive of Cap d'Agde Beach and Gulf of Lion. This 4-star hotel is 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Cap d'Agde Golf Club and 0.8 mi (1.3 km) from Rochelongue Beach.
Make yourself at home in one of the 34 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. While the golfer in the family is out on the course, you can enjoy above-par recreational amenities such as a health club and an outdoor pool. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).
Enjoy French cuisine at RESTAURANT LA PLEIADE, a restaurant where you can enjoy drinks at the bar, take in the golf course view, and even dine alfresco. You can also stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.
Gulf of Lion - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Cap d'Agde Golf Club - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Rochelongue Beach - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

Cap d'Agde Beach - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Fort de Brescou - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Musee Agathois - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Agde Cathedral - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Vias Plage - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi
Noilly Prat Cellars - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi
Libron Works - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi
Étang de Thau - 17.7 km / 11 mi
Espace Georges Brassens - 21.3 km / 13.2 mi
Sete Casino - 22.3 km / 13.8 mi
The nearest airports are:
Beziers (BZR-Cap d'Agde) - 14.5 km / 9 mi
Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean) - 70.8 km / 44 mi
The preferred airport for Le Palmyra Golf Hotel is Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed. Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
24-hour airport shuttle service is available. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to make arrangements.

Renovations and Closures
The property is closed between 11 November and 28 March.

Foto oleh: Gold and Goose / LAT Images
Musim kedua bersama Ducati, Lorenzo masih kesulitan untuk meraih hasil impresif dengan pabrikan yang bermarkas di Borgo Panigale tersebut.
Setelah tersungkur di Qatar akibat masalah rem, X-Fuera hanya mendulang satu poin hasil finis ke-15 di Termas de Rio Hondo.
Akhir pekan ini, gelaran MotoGP akan berlanjut ke Austin. Sirkuit yang belum pernah dikuasai Lorenzo, dan karakternya tidak sesuai dengan Desmosedici GP18.
Meski demikian, pembalap yang identik dengan nomor 99 itu mengaku tetap optimistis, dan akan berusaha meningkatkan feeling dengan motor sepanjang akhir pekan.
“Kami tiba di Texas untuk balapan ketiga musim ini, dan akan menjadi kesempatan lainnya untuk meningkatkan feeling dengan motor,” ujarnya.
“Meski Circuit of The Americas bukanlah salah satu sirkuit yang pernah saya menangi, dan tidak cocok dengan karakteristik Ducati, tahun ini saya memiliki perasaan yang bagus dengan ini [balapan di Austin].
“Kami hanya perlu terus bekerja keras, dan meningkatkan kecepatan kami. Meski Austin adalah sirkuit yang cukup rumit, apapun bisa terjadi.”
Foto oleh: Gold and Goose / LAT Images

GERENZANO – La
Salus Gerenzano compie 25 anni
e festeggerà con tanti campioni dello sport italiano ed internazionale.

Il club, per quanto riguarda il calcio, si prepara ad affrontare il campionato di Terza categoria, alle spalle un ampio settore giovanile; poi basket e volley sono gli altri ingredienti della polisportiva, che tra l’altro si occupa anche della gestione del palasport di via Inglesina. E proprio il palazzetto dello sport sarà la cornice del grande evento che è in fase di preparazione: si terrà il 14 novembre ed è intitolato “A cena con i campioni”. Ci saranno tra gli altri
Beppe Bergomi, Daniele Massaro, Zvonimir Boban, Giancarlo Marocchi, Pietro Aradori, Rosalba Forciniti
, ed anche noti giornalisti come Fabio Caressa. In cucina i cuochi della cvooperativa “Abc” del carcere di Bollate; presente anche l’orchestra “Allegro moderato” costituita da musicisti con disagio psichico, mentale e fisico e da musicisti professionisti. Fra gli ospiti annunciati anche il vescovo ausiliario della Diocesi di Milano, monsignor Pierantonio Tremolada; e Fabrizio Vendramin, artista uboldese vincitore del talent show di Canale 5 “Itali’rounds got talent”.

Questo modulo di informazioni è stato elaborato al fine di fornire informazioni al cliente (""Cliente"") che desidera una prova gratuita in un ambiente elettronico allo scopo di beneficiare dei servizi offerti dal sito SteelOrbis su ""it.steelorbis.com"" prima dell'accettazione del Contratto di Registrazione, e permette al Cliente di ottenere informazioni chiare sui termini e le condizioni della registrazione che si andrà a stabilire, nonché di esaminare il testo del Contratto in questione.

- Il Cliente seleziona l'opzione ""Prova Gratuita"" dalla homepage https://it.steelorbis.com.
- Il Cliente fornisce tutte le informazioni richieste nel modulo ""Prova gratuita"" visualizzato sullo schermo e ne dà conferma.
- SteelOrbis invia un’e-mail di attivazione all'indirizzo e-mail fornito dal Cliente nel modulo di registrazione.
- Il Cliente fa clic sul link di attivazione inviato alla sua e-mail e attiva il proprio account. Nel corso del processo di attivazione dell’account viene mostrato al Cliente il Contratto di Registrazione.
È possibile salvare il Contratto di Registrazione sul proprio computer o farne screenshot per conservarlo. Il Contratto accettato e confermato dal Cliente non viene conservato da SteelOrbis. È sempre possibile accedere al Contratto di Registrazione standard tramite il sito web. Ciononostante, poiché il contratto standard nel tempo può essere soggetto a modifiche, potrebbe presentare variazioni rispetto al testo approvato dall’utente. Di conseguenza, sul sito potrebbe non essere possibile accedere al testo approvato originariamente.
Le informazioni da fornire nel modulo di registrazione e i campi da completare sono indicati in ogni fase dell'operazione. L’utente è tenuto a fornire tali informazioni. Se si lasciano vuoti uno o più campi richiesti, il sistema emetterà un avviso. Si prega di compilare tutti i campi necessari. Prima del completamento dell'operazione, tutti i dati inseriti dall'utente nel passaggio precedente vengono visualizzati nuovamente. L’utente deve assicurarsi che le informazioni da lui fornite siano accurate e complete prima di confermare l'operazione; eventuali informazioni mancanti o errate dovrebbero essere completate o corrette. Eventuali modifiche o correzioni successive alla conferma possono essere eseguite effettuando il login al sito dopo aver portato a termine la registrazione.

Shawnee 51 Trenton 40 – Group 4 Semifinals
Dylan Deveney scored 10 of his 19 points in the fourth quarter as Shawnee reaches the state finals for a second straight year.  Dean Noll added 16 for the Renegades who held a 24-18 halftime lead and never surrendered the lead in the second half.  JSZ has highlights of the Group 4 semifinals from Egg Harbor:


Jersey Sports Zone’s coverage of Trenton High is made possible thanks to the support of Princeton Orthopaedic Associates
Newark Central 54 Ramsey 47 – Group 2 Boys Semifinals
It has been seven years since North 2 Group 2 Champs Newark Central have hoisted a state title and the Blue Devils got one step closer as they took down North 1 Group 2’s Ramsey. Central got ahead early taking a 26-14 lead at halftime over the Rams. Dee-End McRae who had 18 on the night was the spark plug that kept this ttight-knitgroup together to walk away with a victory after four quarters of dominating basketball. Newark Central advances to face Haddonfield at Rutgers University on 3/11, watch the highlights now:

East Side 59 Hackensack 48 – Group 4 Boys Semifinals
North 2 Group 4 Champs and Number 8 in the NJ Top 20 Newark East Side is seeking their first state title since 2014, but before they can think about a championship they would have to worry about the North 1 Group 4 title winners, Hackensack. The Comets took an early 18-6 lead over East Side at the end of the first quarter and maintained a 25-23 lead going into halftime. However, Shamir Johnson would come alive in the third quarter to help the Red Raiders take the lead and thanks to his 19 point performance East Side would eventually take the match up 59-48. They will face Southern Champions and fellow NJ Top 20 royalty Shawnee on 3/11 at Rutgers University. Watch the highlights:

WYF Cheer Merchandise
Be sure to check out the
ONLINE STORE
for cheerleading merchandise which you can order and pay for online.
WYF now has a convenient new way to purchase your favorite cheerleading merchandise. Together with the Wilton Sport Shop, we are offering for sale navy cheer shorts, blue plaid sleep pants, and a great duffel bag for carrying your pompoms, fleece, water bottle etc.
All items feature the new WYF custom cheer logo, and can include your name.
Click  to see these great items in WYF's Online Store. Cheer items are towards the end of the list. You can place your order online, and the Wilton Sport Shop will notify you when your items are ready. Although online ordering is our preference, you can print out a hard copy of the WYF Cheer Merchandise Form
(
Click Here for Form
)
You will need to drop off the form at the Sports Shop to be filled.
WYF Cheer Merchandise items are good quality apparel and bags which your cheerleader will be happy to wear to practice and to school. They also make wonderful gifts  and are a great way to show your support for WYF !!
You will receive an email or phone message when your item is ready for pickup.
Your order will be available for pickup at the Wilton Sports Shop, 426 Danbury Road, Wilton, CT.  Phone 203-762-8631.
Size Options: Choose Youth Xsm, Small, Med, Large  or Adult Small, Med or Large

The gHacks blog has posted a tutorial for streaming live TV (with a slant toward sports) to your PC so that you never have to miss another big game.
I will describe three freeware programs that let you connect to channels that stream tv and especially live sports events. This includes all major European football (soccer) leagues, champions league, uefa cup, espn, wrestling, national team matches, boxing matches also.
If you're desperate to catch that game that you can't seem to find anywhere else, this hack is worth a try.

Kristers Serģis (Dzimis 1974. gada 14. janvārī) ir bijušais latviešu motokrosa braucējs, piecas reizes ieguvis pasaules čempiona titulu.
Pirmā motokrosa ekipāža, kas piecas reizes ieguva pasaules čempiones titulu. Kristera tēvam, ne mazāk savulaik populārajam un vienam no labākajiem PSRS motokrosa ekipāžu pilotiem Jānim Serģim, nebija iespējas piedalīties pasaules čempionātos, bet viņa ceļu izcili turpināja dēls. Uz pirmo pasaules čempionāta posmu motokrosā ekipažām Ķegumā 1996. gadā sanāca vairāk nekā 20 tūkstoši skatītāju – tikai Serģa/Rasmaņa dēļ, kuri toreiz vēl tikai lauzās pasaules elitē. Serģa piemērs kļuva par piemēru tam, ka mēs motosportā varam būt labākie pasaulē, ko pēc gadiem apliecināja Pauls Jonass MX2 klasē, ko turpinās apliecināt nākamie jauno motokrosa braucēji.
Pirmais, kurš piecas reizes kļuva par pasaules čempionu motokrosā blakusvāģu klasē (1997, 1998, 2000, 2001, 2002), 4 reizes ierindojās 2. vietā (1999, 2003, 2005, 2008), 2007. gadā ierindojās 3. vietā. 2005. un 2007. gadā kļuvis par Eiropas čempionu komandā. 1997. gadā ticis apbalvots ar trešās šķiras Triju Zvaigžņu ordeni.
"
"
München -
                        Brock Lesnar behält beim WWE Greatest Royal Rumble einmal mehr seinen Universal Title. Hat die Wrestling-Liga Roman Reigns damit zu sehr geschwächt?
Einmal mehr gab es Spekulation, dass Brock Lesnar vor seinem letzten Match für WWE stand.
Einmal mehr haben sich die Spekulationen erübrigt.
Zweieinhalb Wochen nach seinem
völlig überraschenden Sieg im Hauptkampf von WrestleMania34
durfte Universal Champion auch beim -
von zahlreichen realen Kontroversen überschatteten
- Greatest Royal Rumble in Saudi-Arabien über Roman Reigns triumphieren.
Anstelle eines Wechsels zur UFC bleibt Lesnar also weiter an der Spitze der Showkampf-Liga - und wird es auch noch eine Weile bleiben (
SPORT1 erklärt: So funktioniert die Showkampf-Liga WWE
).
Bei der nächsten Großveranstaltung - Backlash am 6. Mai - wird der Teilzeit-Champ nicht dabei sein. Wann er wieder mitmischen wird? Offen, vermutet wird eine Rückkehr zum Money-in-the-Bank-Pay-Per-View im Juni. Wer sein nächster Gegner sein wird? Spannende Frage.
Über ein Jahr lang soll WWE darauf hingearbeitet haben, Lesnar bei WrestleMania von Reigns entthronen zu lassen, um diesen noch mehr als Topstar zu etablieren. Es folgte die späte Kehrtwende - die nun auch beim Steel Cage Match in Dschidda nicht korrigiert wurde.
Zwar stellte WWE ihren designierten Topstar Reigns einmal mehr auch in der Niederlage stark dar und ließ ihn betont unglücklich verlieren - Reigns schleuderte Lesnar durch die Käfigwand, wodurch der durch die Regeln des Matches Champion blieb.
Dennoch ist Reigns in der Drehbuch-Logik eigentlich zu geschwächt, um noch ein Titelmatch gegen Lesnar zu erhalten. Ganz davon abgesehen, dass sich die Paarung Lesnar - Reigns zunehmend verbraucht und die sehr von den jeweiligen Standardaktionen geprägten Duelle auch von wohlmeinenden Fans zunehmend kritisiert werden.
Reigns wird bei Backlash dann auch erstmal gegen Samoa Joe antreten: Die beiden bestreiten schon seit einigen Wochen ein Kurzprogramm, in dem Joe Reigns sein Versagen gegen Lesnar vorhält.
Wird Reigns das Match gewinnen (
Joe wechselt nach Backlash vom RAW- in den SmackDown-Kader
) und dann wieder Lesnar angreifen? Möglich, aber WWE hat beim Rumble auch einen anderen Herausforderer in Stellung gebracht.
Braun Strowman, der Shooting-Star des vergangenen WWE-Jahres
, gewann den 50-Mann-Hauptkampf. Er könnte nun genauso gut dran sein, wofür nicht nur die reine Story-Logik spricht.
Wie der
Wrestling Observer
zuletzt berichtete, gibt es hinter den Kulissen von WWE mittlerweile Stimmen, die Strowman vom Potenzial her mittlerweile auf Augenhöhe mit Reigns sehen - und ihm das Potenzial, ein mindestens ebenso großer Star zu werden.
Gerüchten zufolge hat Lesnar bei WWE nur eine Kurzzeit-Verlängerung unterschrieben. WWE blieben nicht mehr viele Gelegenheiten, einen Wrestler ""over"" zu bringen, indem sie ihn Lesnar besiegen lassen, die Liga muss sich gut überlegen, wem sie diese Ehre zuteil werden lässt.
Der frisch verpflichtete Bobby Lashley ist dem
Observer
zufolge trotz anderslautender Gerüchte nicht für ein Programm gegen Lesnar vorgesehen. Reigns wird seinen lang ersehnten Triumph über Lesnar gewiss noch bekommen. Aber womöglich ja erst, nachdem er seinen Gürtel schon an Strowman verloren hat.
Diese Seite teilen"
""
"
Over the last 20 years, the
TCU athletic department
has used a model of stability and constant progress to work its way into the national consciousness. Relegated to the
Western Athletic Conference
following the collapse of its home for 72 years, the Southwest Conference, the Horned Frogs worked their way back up the ladder, moving from the WAC (1996-2000) to
Conference USA
(2001-2004) to the
Mountain West
(2005-2011) before finally reaching the
Big XII
in 2012.
Having accomplished so much over the past 25 years, it would be easy for the athletic department to sit back and admire its achievements, but that’s not the approach that TCU Athletic Director
Jeremiah Donati
is taking.

Donati took the reins of TCU Athletics in December 2017 after serving for six years in various capacities under his mentor and predecessor Chris del Conte. One of the first projects he tackled after being named AD was to step up the digital presence of the program.
“Our marketing department had a small video component in the past and we found that fraction of the department wasn’t able to service all the sports,” he says. “We separated that and bolstered that group to give them some autonomy.
Upgrades to stadiums and athletic facilities is another area where Donati is looking to push forward and continue improving. Despite completing a renovation to
Amon Carter Stadium
in 2012, he saw the opportunity expand premium seating options for fans. This move means increased revenue for all sports, not just football.
Donati also hits on the possibility of expanded alcohol sales at sporting events, his relationship with TCU’s three most high-profile coaches, and the advantage the school has by being located in Fort Worth.
No longer feeling like the newcomers to the conference, TCU is looking to take the next step in the Big XII and on the national stage. With the current leadership the university has in the place, there is no reason to think it can’t.
For the latest news, videos, and podcasts in the Sports & Entertainment Industry, be sure to subscribe to our industry publication.
Follow us on social media for the latest updates in B2B!
Twitter –
@SportsEntMKSL
Facebook –
facebook.com/marketscale
LinkedIn –
linkedin.com/company/marketscale"

afl
The narrative has changed at the Western Bulldogs. Despite their floundering form of late, most analysts and fans have been of the view that it is only a matter of time before they rediscover the kind of form that took them to a historic flag last year. After yet another listless defeat, it seems that faith has been shaken to its core.
If there was ever going to be a match when the Dogs could rediscover their confidence, it was Friday night against the Crows. Everything seemed set up perfectly: wet conditions which suit their inside midfielders; their backs against the wall; a tough away game which they relished in last year’s finals campaign. None of these factors proved decisive in a second half that virtually went according to script for the Dogs of 2017. The bark seen last year is worryingly eluding the boys from the Kennel.
On present form, the Bulldogs are going to become the first team since Hawthorn in 2009 to miss the finals after winning the premiership. In many ways, the Dogs bare a striking resemblance to the Hawks side that shocked Geelong in 2008. Both teams essentially won a flag ahead of their time; both were underdogs; both struggled to cope with the resulting pressure that comes with suddenly being the hunted.
In the Hawks side of 08, Grant Birchall, Stephen Gilham, Jarryd Roughead, Xavier Ellis, Jordan Lewis, Clinton Young, Lance Franklin and Cyril Rioli were all under the age of 24. Incredibly for the Dogs, 14 players in their historic premiership side were under the age of 24. This abundance of youth is why this season is not as dire as it seems for the Dogs. If you look beyond the premiership, they are somewhere near the level they should be. Like the Hawks post 2008, time is on their side.
If anything, they have more scope for development than the Hawks did before they turned into arguably the best team of the modern era. The one glaring difference between the two sides is that Hawthorn’s core group of youngsters that were coming through in 2008 just all happened to be superstars — something the Dogs do not have with the exception of Marcus Bontempelli and Jake Stringer on a good day.
On this premise, the Dogs will face a more problematic path towards their second flag than the Hawks did when they defeated Fremantle in 2013. Complicating things further for the Dogs is the fact they will be competing for the highest honour against teams with similar age demographics. GWS are already a seriously good side, while Melbourne and St Kilda have the players to become a potent threat also.
It is important not to forget that this season has not been without its challenges for the young Dogs. Tom Boyd and recruit Travis Cloke have been cut down with mental health issues, while Dale Morris, Lin Jong, Tory Dickson, Jordan Roughead and Josh Dunkley have battled serious injuries.
On face value, it seems only Caleb Daniel and Bailey Dale have categorically improved from last year, while Bontempelli and Jackson Macrae have been steady at best. Premiership heroes such as Jason Johannisen, Liam Picken, Matthew Boyd, Stringer, Fletcher Roberts and Clay Smith have been badly out of sorts.
Despite all the pessimism surrounding the Dogs demise, not all is lost. They can still play finals, but their form would have to drastically improve. They need an injection of confidence from somewhere, and if anyone is capable of providing it, Luke Beveridge can —but even his patience is beginning to be tested.
The language used in his press conference after the Adelaide game went into unfamiliar territory. Words like “gutted and “unacceptable” are feelings we have not been use to hearing from Beveridge since he took charge. He knows their head is on the guillotine, but he also knows they have the character to turn their season around. Only time will tell.

motorsport

After Lewis Hamilton took pole the day before, and looked extremely comfortable in the early part of the race, it looked as if only the winning margin was going to be the question that needed […]
Our goal at FOX SPORTS Australia is to invest in the future of sports journalism, with aim to support those who aspire to someday work in our industry."
"
Oh no, only one day left! The good thing is that the last day was as great as it can probably be, and hopefully today will be the same.
Hammer Throw Men Final
The evening session started with a great Hammer competition. The favorites were probably Pars and Fajdek, who surprised everyone last year at the world championships, when he won the gold ahead of Pars.
Pars had a great series, which peaked first at his first attempt – a 82.18. Fajdek, who changed his dorky glasses from last year to a cool pair, and who looks like an XL version of Harry Potter, came close with a fifth throw of 82.05. But it wasn’t enough and he couldn’t get any further. Pars, on the other hand, came into his last throw as a champion, and unleashed a PB of 82.69! That’s a true champion! Fajdek is great, though, and he’s only 25. He can rule the field for a long time after Pars.
Third came Sergej Litvinov jr., son of legendary Sergey Litvinov. While it is clear the son will never reach his father’s heights or results, it’s still nice to see a family tradition.
Even nicer was to see Szymon Ziolkowski, the Olympic champion from Sydney (!!!) finishing fifth with a SB. Damn! Fuck you, age! Unlike Vizzoni, who still competes at the tender age of 41, but never finishes near the top, Ziolkowski can still hang in there with the young guns.
Pole Vault Men Final
I love Renaud Lavillenie. Loved him from the first time I saw him compete, which I believe was at the 2009 world championships. Even before he started winning titles (he finished 3
rd
then), his style was so much better than the rest of the jumpers that you simply could not be against him. He’s not very tall, but he has this great elasticity and the way he flies up, like fired from a cannon!
In addition, Renaud and I were born on the same day. The day I was born in Ulyanovsk, USSR, on September 18
th
, 1986, a few thousand miles away, in Barbezieux-Saint-Hilaire, France, was born a future pole vaulting legend. So that’s another reason why I’m fond of Renaud, although I didn’t discover it until later on.
Anyway, Renaud was a clear favorite for the gold. And it turned out he needed only 2 jumps to win it. Renaud cleared 5.65 on his first attempt, and then waited for all the other vaulters to fail at 5.75, before clearing 5.80 on his first try as well, and securing the gold.
After that he cleared 5.90 on his second attempt, before setting the bar at 6.01, for a new CR. However, he couldn’t clear that height, and thus finished with a 5.90 (a great result by itself) and a third successive European gold. Such a great athlete! It’s a shame he doesn’t have a world gold yet. I hope (and think) that this will change next year, though.
The silver medal was won by a Polish jumper by the name of Pawel Wojciechowski, whom I admit I didn’t know. I did know his compatriot Piotr Lisek, but Pawel? The bronze went to Jan Kudlicka.
4*100 Women Qualification
The only surprise here was the stick dropping by the German quartet. Damn, no 100m final for Verena Sailer, and now no 4*100 final as well?! WTF is this?!
The hot favorites – France and Great Britain, won their heats. The Dutch have Schippers, that’s true, but unfortunately you can’t clone her three times and field a quartet of Dafnes. I think they can challenge the Ukrainians for the bronze, and maybe threaten the silver, but I don’t think they can outperform BOTH the French and the Brits.
BTW, don’t count out the Swiss! They have a really nice quartet of their own, and with the help of the home crowd they might make a big splash as well.
4*100 Men Qualification
Unless the Brits drop the stick, the gold is theirs. Something really serious needs to happen for them to lose it. Like Chambers ending his career midway through his 100, or Dasalou proclaiming that he is too black for this shit, or Gemili pushing his kindness to a whole other level and deciding that Lemaitre deserves a gold medal and simply walking his 100.
Seriously. This kind of shit needs to happen for the Brits to finish lower than 1
st
.
The French are the favorites for the silver, but ze Germans beat them in their heat, and the Swiss set a NR in theirs and they mean business as well. And with Vicaut out? Or maybe he simply didn’t run in the heats? Who knows. Anyway, I look forward eagerly for the final tomorrow. I reckon the Brits might even break their own ER they set back in 1999 (Chaimbers was part of that team!!! Fuck you, age (2)!).
P.S. Did you catch Francis Obikwelu running the second leg for Portugal??? I saw the broadcast in Russian and the commentators didn’t mention it, but come on! He’s the European fucking record holder! 9.86! AND he came out of retirement to help his team at the age of 35! The dude is a European sprinting legend. AND Portugal did qualify for the final!
800m Women Final
At first it looked like the men’s 800. Lynsey Sharp started out very strong and separated herself from the group. However, Maryna Arzamasova stayed with her all the way. Unlike Bosse, though, they did manage to maintain the fast pace throughout the whole 800. Arzamasova played it very clever, and stayed behind Sharp until it was time to go in for the kill, which she did. Sharp didn’t have an answer for Maryna, but at least she manage to finish second, which is something Bosse couldn’t do.
The time? A nice one, 1:58.15. In fact, 4 of the 8 participants set a PB in the race, including Arzamasova.
Behind the leaders, a fierce battle was going on for the bronze medal. Katya Poistogova surged forward way too late, but she nearly caught the Pole Jozwik at the finish line. Nearly. In the end it’s gold for Arzamosova, silver for Sharp, and bronze for Jozwik.
4*400 Women Qualification
What can you say about the pretty predictable heats? Not much. The finals will be different, though.
All the favorites came through. Russia, Great Britain, Ukraine and France will battle for the three medals.
Some fun facts from the qualifying rounds: Did you see who ran the second leg for France? Muriel Hurtis! The bronze medalist in the 200 from the 2003 world championships! I remembered her as a quality sprinter, but here she is, running the 400 at the age of 35. Fuck you, age (3)!
Did you see Victoria Ohuruogu running for Great Britain? Apparently Christine has a talented younger sister. She is nowhere near her older sibling right now, but then again, she is only 21.
And of course Olivia Borlee running one of Belgium’s legs. I am really fond of the Borlees.
Ok Michael, cut the bullshit, who will win the gold??? I’m going with the Russians. They have an amazing depth even without some of their best runners.
Triple Jump Women Final
This was a good one! I betted on Koneva, but I had no idea that Saladukha will choose this particular moment to produce her best jumps of the year!
She started slow, with a mere 14.12, but after that she produced one of her very best jumping series: 14.73, 14.68, a foul, 14.59, 14.63. Just a reminder: she came into the championships with a SB of 14.20! Talk about peaking at the right moment…
Koneva wasn’t as good or as consistent as Olha, and had to settle for second place once again, after the worlds last year. Her best jump was 14.69, a good result, but she jumped 20cm further earlier this year… I feel that this is a disappointment. But hey, Saladukha was great and she is a deserving champion!
Third place went to another Russian, Irina Gumenyuk, who jumped a SB of 14.46.
All in all, a good competition and some good results.
Discus Women Final
A one woman show, that’s what it was. When Perkovic is healthy, she is like Valerie Adams – she’s in a world of her own in terms of results, and her favorite tune is probably MC Hammer’s “U Can’t Touch This”. I haven’t seen her lose a competition when she is healthy for several years now. True, she lost one diamond league meet this year, but that was back when she had back problems, which impeded her performance.
But now? Oh boy, we were in for a treat! First throw – 64.58, and already first place.
Second throw – 67.37. Third throw – 68.78. The fourth one was a foul. Fifth throw – BOOM! 71.08!!! I take back what I wrote about Wlodarczyk’s result being the best performance of the championship. THIS IS THE LONGEST THROW IN THE WORLD SINCE 1992!!! I repeat – no other woman threw the discus further in the last 22 years! And we all know the nature of those amazing results from the 80’s… No wonder no one can repeat them now.
An easy gold for Sandra, with an amazing performance. And she’s so likable, too! She probably took some dancing lessons from Vlasic.
Robert-Michon, one of the leading throwers outside of Planet Perkovic, took the silver, almost 6 meters behind Sandra. Shanice Craft, who is of lesser fame, took third place.
4*400 Men Qualification
Here we had some drama. The Ukrainians were DQ’d due to obstructing the Dutch runners during one of the exchanges and causing them to drop the bass. Or the stick, don’t remember which one.
The Dutch were then given an opportunity to run on their own and try to set a time that would make them qualify for the final. They failed.
Other than that, no real surprises. The Brits are in, and so are the French and the Russians, although the Russians’ time was not as good.
Frankly, I was surprised to see Belgium running so badly that they only qualified as one of the fastest losers. True, they only run one Borlee, but still… These championships are not one of Borlees’ best, let’s hope they can make amends in the final, because if they are healthy I’m betting on the Belgians.
400m Hurdles Women Final
An interesting final that might have been even better if all the great names would have competed. My guess was almost correct – Child finished first and Titimets (with a PB) second, but Rosolova came only fourth, when Irina Davydova managed to pipe her for the bronze medal.
Nevertheless, Rosolova, a.k.a. mini-Hejnova, should take home some kind of award due to her sporting some of the best tattoos in the championships. The butterfly is particularly awesome.
5000m Women Final
I predicted a win for Hassan, but she couldn’t make it a double. The race was really slow and several laps of 80 seconds caused me to really hate it and to almost gauge my eyes out, but fortunately the finish was dramatic enough.
Hassan battled with Bahta the Swede for the gold. I was sure that Hassan would sprint for the win because I was really impressed with her performance in the 1500, but Bahta decided to avenge Aregawi, and didn’t surrender. Bahta led during the final lap, when Hassan went in for the kill. Hassan increased her speed, overcame every other runner, and even Bahta for a short time. But then Bahta pressed the NOS button and retained first place, which she maintained until the finish line.
This is pretty amazing, because the runner who is gaining ground on the leader usually has the advantage, and it’s rare to see a runner who was overtaken regain the lead. So Bahta – you’re something special, you. I wasn’t familiar with that runner until now, but I will be following her from now own.
Bahta finishes with a gold and a silver, not bad at all. Jo Pavey, who shook the world (or at least me) when she won the 10,000 at 40 years old, finished only 7
th
. The bronze went to another Dutch – Susan Kuijken, who is actually really cute.
Ok, so now it ends. The post, I mean. The championships have one more day left, with some of the most interesting events still waiting to crown the winner.

Последнее мнение
Все мнения
Михаил Щипанов
Сотрудники Главного следственного управления (ГСУ) ГУ МВД по Москве опубликовали видео с допроса нападающего футбольного клуба «Зенит» Александра Кокорина и полузащитника «Краснодара» Павла Мамаева. Накануне оба футболиста самостоятельно приехали в участок и сознались в нападении на водителя Первого канала Виталия Соловчука и чиновника Минпромторга Дениса Пака.
После дачи показаний обоих спортсменов задержали и поместили на 48 часов в следственный изолятор. По последним данным, 11 октября фигуранты уголовного дела примут участие в очных ставках.

Ранее сообщалось, что игроки клубов РПЛ
после бурного празднования 10-летия дружбы
избили двоих мужчин в Москве.
Соловчука
— на парковке возле ресторана,
Пака
— в одном из столичных кафе. Оба инцидента попали на камеры.
В отношении спортсменов было возбуждено уголовное дело по статье «Побои», однако позже
его переквалифицировали на статью «Хулиганство».
Поделиться

Yandex Zen
Спускаемый аппарат корабля «Союз» с космонавтом и астронавтом на борту приземлился в Казахстане. Ранее во время старта ракеты-носителя произошла авария.
«Есть посадка», — приводит «Интерфакс» слова собеседника в органах воздушного поиска и спасения.


Поисково-спасательные команды вылетели на вертолётах к предполагаемому месту приземления «Союза», следует из трансляции на сайте NASA. На...

                    выдано Федеральной службой по надзору в сфере связи, информационных технологий и массовых коммуникаций"
